translation.en: [policeman 1] Stop, police!
[policeman 2] Stop that girl!
-[woman 1 shouts] -[Enola] Excuse me!
-[Enola] Terribly sorry. -[man 2] Oi!
-[horse whinnies] -[man 3] Watch where you're sodding going!
[policeman 1] Stop her!
Perhaps I should explain.
My name is Enola Holmes. You may remember me.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Enola Holmes. Forse vi ricordate di me.

translation.en: After solving my first case…
translation.it: Dopo aver risolto il mio primo caso…

translation.en: [grunts] Hello.
[Enola] …I started a business.
A detective agency.
Open and ready for my first clients.
translation.it: …aperta e pronta per i miei primi clienti.

translation.en: I was going to join the pantheon of great Victorian detectives.
translation.it: Mi sarei unita al pantheon dei grandi investigatori vittoriani.

translation.en: -Detective Field. -[Field] Yes.
-[Enola] Mackenzie Macintosh. -Hi.
-[Enola] Sir Alfred Hornblower. -Tally-ho!
-[Enola] And the infamous Reginald Swain. -[Swain growls]
And best of all, I would be joining my brother. I would be his equal.
translation.it: E, meglio ancora, mi sarei unita a mio fratello. Sarei stata una sua pari.

translation.en: A detective in my own right, worthy of the Holmes name.
translation.it: Un'investigatrice a tutti gli effetti, degna del cognome Holmes.

translation.en: Congratulations.
-[Enola] Or so I thought. -[bell rings]
Am I addressing the secretary?
You're how old?
translation.it: - Quanti anni avete? - Acciderboli, siete giovane.

translation.en: -Stone the crows, you're young. -[Enola] My age is an advantage.
translation.it: - Quanti anni avete? - Acciderboli, siete giovane. E questo è un vantaggio.

translation.en: I can go to places others can't, explore where others won't.
translation.it: Posso esplorare luoghi che ad altri sono preclusi.

translation.en: And I can fight. I know jujitsu.
translation.it: E poi so combattere. Conosco il jujitsu.

translation.en: But you're a girl. Yes, I am. Um…
translation.it: - Ma siete una ragazzina. - Sì, è vero.

translation.en: What experience have you had?
-The Tewkesbury case? -Well, that was Sherlock Holmes.
translation.it: Il caso Tewkesbury? - È stato Sherlock Holmes. - Sherlock…

translation.en: -That was Sherlock-- -Sherlock--
-Sherlock Holmes, wasn't it? -I assure you, it was mine.
translation.it: - …Sherlock Holmes, no? - Vi assicuro che il caso era mio.

translation.en: Good man, that Tewkesbury. Brave lad.
translation.it: Brav'uomo, quel Tewkesbury. Un ragazzo coraggioso.

translation.en: -Tell me-- -Tell me--
-Tell me-- -Yes?
Might your brother be free?
Read all about it! Read all about it!
Sherlock Holmes and the case of the Brixton corpse.
translation.it: Sherlock Holmes e il caso del cadavere di Brixton.

translation.en: [Enola] So, my brother.
While I had not a single case, Sherlock has been drowning in them.
translation.it: Io non avevo neanche un caso, mentre Sherlock era sempre richiestissimo.

translation.en: Though his latest appears to be vexing him.
translation.it: Anche se il suo ultimo caso sembra tormentarlo.

translation.en: My mother, meanwhile, is still on the run.
translation.it: RICERCATA PER INTERROGATORIO Mia madre, nel mentre, è ancora in fuga…

translation.en: And trying not to draw attention to herself.
[chuckles] Though that's never been her forte.
translation.it: Anche se non le riesce benissimo. PARI DIRITTI PER LE DONNE

translation.en: [Enola] Yes, and then there is… him.
translation.it: Sì, e poi c'è… INVITO AL BALLO …lui.

translation.en: [Tewkesbury] My lords, reform is not a task to be accomplished,
translation.it: Signori miei, la riforma non è un compito da svolgere,

translation.en: nor a bill that can be passed. Rather it is a constant need for change.
translation.it: né un disegno di legge da approvare, bensì un costante bisogno di cambiamento.

translation.en: [Enola] Lord Tewkesbury, the champion of change and progress.
translation.it: Lord Tewkesbury, paladino del cambiamento e del progresso.

translation.en: A man to approach with the noblest cause.
translation.it: Un uomo dedito alle cause più nobili.

translation.en: [Enola] But I had no time for distractions. And besides, he's still a nincompoop.
translation.it: Ma io non avevo tempo per le distrazioni. E poi, resta uno sciocco.

translation.en: [Eudoria] Too many people make it their sole purpose in life to fit into the world around them.
translation.it: Troppe persone dedicano la propria vita ad adeguarsi al mondo che le circonda.

translation.en: This is a mistake.
It's your path, Enola.
translation.it: La tua strada è solo tua, Enola.

translation.en: Sometimes, you'll stumble.
Sometimes, you'll fall.
But no matter how lost you feel,
translation.it: Ma indipendentemente da quanto ti senti perduta,

translation.en: if you stay true to yourself, the path will always find you again.
translation.it: se resterai fedele a te stessa ritroverai sempre la tua strada.

translation.en: [Enola] But my path, it seemed, had come to an end.
translation.it: Tuttavia, la mia strada sembrava giunta al termine.

translation.en: I was a failure.
All I could do now was go home.
Yes?
I've come to the right place then.
Is it true you find lost people?
translation.it: È vero che trovi le persone scomparse?

translation.en: Where did you get this? It's months old.
translation.it: Dove l'hai preso? È di mesi fa.

translation.en: I found it on the street.
Who have you lost?
My sister.
[girl] Watch the gap.
[girl] She disappeared a week ago.
Everyone says she's run away, but Sarah wouldn't do that,
translation.it: Dicono che sia scappata, ma Sarah non lo farebbe.

translation.en: not to me.
She's my only family now.
[girl] This way.
The other girls are still at work.
translation.it: Le altre sono ancora al lavoro.

translation.en: Tea?
[Enola] Thank you.
Might I see her bedroom?
Ours, you mean?
You're standing in it.
We're lucky. Most girls here are five to a room.
translation.it: Siamo fortunate. Di solito si sta in cinque per stanza.

translation.en: This might help.
Oh. Sarah likes to leave cheese out for 'em.
translation.it: Sarah lascia sempre loro del formaggio.

translation.en: She's soft.
What does she look like, Sarah?
About this tall.
translation.it: È alta più o meno così.

translation.en: Pretty.
Very pretty.
Green eyes, red hair, freckles--
Red hair?
We weren't sisters in the usual way.
[girl 2] Found sisters. Sarah took her in.
translation.it: Sono sorelle per caso. Sarah l'ha accolta.

translation.en: Who's this, Bess?
-Enola Holmes. -She's a detective.
She looks like she'll blow over in the wind. Mae!
translation.it: - Un filo di vento la farebbe volare via. - Mae!

translation.en: [Enola] So, Bessie, what was Sarah wearing the day she disappeared?
translation.it: Allora, Bessie, cosa indossava Sarah quand'è scomparsa?

translation.en: -What's she doing? -Shh.
[Mae] She's wasting her time.
It was her other dress, the green one.
Does she like reading?
Oh yes. She taught herself.
translation.it: Oh, sì. Ha imparato da sola.

translation.en: Sarah said you had to learn about the world if you're gonna live in it.
translation.it: Sarah dice che devi conoscere il mondo, per viverci.

translation.en: [Enola] Makeup.
Did she have a suitor? [Bessie] Nah. But there's plenty have taken an interest.
translation.it: - Aveva un corteggiatore? - No, ma molti erano interessati a lei.

translation.en: She weren't much of a gardener.
Look, how about you quit sniffing round?
translation.it: Perché non la smetti di ficcanasare?

translation.en: [Bessie] Quiet, Mae! Just let her do her job.
translation.it: Taci, Mae. Lasciale fare il suo lavoro.

translation.en: The 12th of March. Does that date mean anything to you?
translation.it: Il 12 marzo. Questa data ti dice qualcosa?

translation.en: [Mae] That's enough.
We don't need help from people like you. I found her, so she's staying.
translation.it: - Non ci serve l'aiuto di gente come te. - L'ho trovata io, quindi può restare.

translation.en: -[Mae] Bloody girls poking their nose in. -[Enola chuckles]
-And she didn't leave a note? -Just this.
translation.it: - Non ha lasciato alcun biglietto? - Solo queste.

translation.en: She worked two jobs, you see. We couldn't get by without it.
translation.it: Faceva due lavori. Senza non riusciremmo a tirare avanti.

translation.en: Washed glasses at a pub. Some place called The Stag Antlers.
translation.it: Lavava i piatti in un pub. Un posto chiamato Corna di Cervo.

translation.en: You can have it.
Oh. No, it's all right. We'll figure that out later.
translation.it: No, va bene così. Ce ne occuperemo più tardi.

translation.en: So tell me, when was the last time you saw her?
translation.it: Dimmi, quando l'hai vista l'ultima volta?

translation.en: A week ago, at the match factory.
translation.it: Una settimana fa, alla fabbrica di fiammiferi.

translation.en: She had a fight with Mr. Crouch, the foreman, in his office.
translation.it: Aveva litigato con il capo, il signor Crouch, nel suo ufficio.

translation.en: -What about? -He said she was thieving.
But Sarah's honest.
The match factory, is that where she works?
translation.it: Quindi Sarah lavora alla fabbrica di fiammiferi?

translation.en: Where we all work. We're match girls, ain't we?
translation.it: Sì, ci lavoriamo tutte. Siamo fiammiferaie, no?

translation.en: -Then that's where we'll start. -So you'll take it? You'll take the case?
translation.it: Allora iniziamo da lì. Quindi accetti? Accetti il caso?

translation.en: Thank you, Miss Holmes. Thank you.
[Enola] At last, my first case. Well, actually, my second.
translation.it: Finalmente, il mio primo caso. Beh, in realtà è il secondo.

translation.en: I shall find you, Sarah Chapman.
Red hair, green dress, makeup, science books, 12th March.
translation.it: Capelli rossi, abito verde. Cosmetici, libri di scienze. Il 12 marzo.

translation.en: Whatever you've been up to…
…the game is afoot.
[Bessie] Stay with me. Follow my way.
translation.it: Restami vicina e fai come me.

translation.en: -[Enola] How many girls work here? -[Bessie] Five hundred, maybe six.
translation.it: - Quante ragazze lavorano qui? - Cinquecento, forse seicento.

translation.en: [Enola] How do I look?
-Is my neckerchief all right? -Oh, well, it's around your neck.
translation.it: - Il fazzoletto va bene? - Beh, ce l'hai al collo.

translation.en: Morning, Bessie. Morning, Doris.
[foreman] Mouth.
Mouth.
-Mouth. -[man] Come on.
-Next. -Out.
-[girl] Please, Mr. Crouch. -[Crouch] I said, out.
translation.it: - Vi prego, sig. Crouch. - Ho detto fuori.

translation.en: -Mouth. -What are you looking at?
[Crouch] Oi, new girl. Name in the register.
translation.it: Ehi, ragazza nuova. Scrivi il tuo nome nel registro.

translation.en: Mouth.
-What are you looking for? -Typhus.
[Bessie] That's the phosphorus.
Don't worry, you get used to the smell.
translation.it: Non preoccuparti, all'odore ci si abitua.

translation.en: Is this where she worked?
Put the matches on the comb…
slide 'em along, up and into the box.
translation.it: fai scorrere la mano e via, nelle scatole.

translation.en: Simple enough. -You try. -[tense music plays]
That is a penny off your wages.
translation.it: Ti decurto un penny dalla paga.

translation.en: [Bessie] She's just learning the way, Mr. Crouch.
[Crouch] She better learn quicker, or it's a penny off yours too.
translation.it: Meglio che si sbrighi, o levo un penny anche a te.

translation.en: Anyone else want a money dock? How about you, eh?
translation.it: Qualcun'altra vuole che le riduca la paga? Tu, magari?

translation.en: No, didn't think so.
Right, back to work.
I need to get up into that office.
[chuckles] Not a hope.
[Crouch] No talking.
[Eudoria] All it takes is one small thing
to change the rules of the world.
translation.it: per cambiare le regole del mondo.

translation.en: Oi. Faster fingers, faster fingers.
Hurrah!
How did that bloody happen, eh?
Well, pick 'em up.
Oi, pick 'em up. Pick 'em up, pick 'em up.
[Crouch] Right! Back to work.
Why were you here?
[Crouch] Come on, girls.
[Enola] Red.
translation.it: FIAMMIFERI A DUE PENNY Sono rossi.

translation.en: [Crouch] Time's a-wasting.
Don't you look at me like that, girl.
-[workers speaking indistinctly] -[Crouch] Oi, stop talking!
-[Enola gasps] -Green eyes, red hair.
[Enola] So you did steal something.
[man] Charles! This is not what I was expecting when we made our arrangement.
This is blatant extortion.
Criminal!
-My pockets are empty. -You think mine full?
translation.it: - Ho le tasche vuote. - E le mie sono piene?

translation.en: You gave me your word you'd find whoever was doing this to us.
translation.it: Avete giurato che avreste trovato il responsabile.

translation.en: You sound almost threatening, Mr. Lyon.
This is not what I expected when we began our arrangement.
translation.it: Non è questo che mi aspettavo dal nostro accordo.

translation.en: And now theft, on top of everything else.
translation.it: E ora si aggiunge anche un furto!

translation.en: -You heard the man. Get this dealt with. -[Mr. Lyon] Come along, William.
translation.it: - Avete sentito. Risolvete la cosa. - Vieni, William.

translation.en: [woman] Sir, do you have any suspicions as to who this perpetrator might be?
translation.it: Signore, avete qualche sospetto sul potenziale colpevole?

translation.en: [Charles] Would I be asking you if I did?
translation.it: Chiederei a voi, se così fosse?

translation.en: But, sir, perhaps if we were to consider whether this theft is connected.
translation.it: Dovremmo considerare l'idea che questo furto sia collegato.

translation.en: -I have ideas-- -Did I ask for your advice?
translation.it: - Ho delle idee… - Vi ho chiesto consiglio?

translation.en: Or did I simply tell you to get it done?
translation.it: O vi ho semplicemente detto di occuparvene?

translation.en: I'll make sure the right people know, sir.
[Charles] Miss Troy!
[Miss Troy] Yes, sir.
Our ladies are working at the highest level of production and efficiency.
translation.it: Le nostre ragazze lavorano al massimo dell'efficienza.

translation.en: -Are they not, William? -Yes, Father.
translation.it: - Non è così, William? - Sì, padre.

translation.en: -[Mr. Lyon] Please, if you will… -[foreboding music plays]
Doris, how are you? How's your sister? Is she, um, still unwell?
translation.it: Doris, come va? Come sta tua sorella? Ancora male?

translation.en: Uh, yes, Mr. Lyon.
Typhus.
Really is the plague of our time.
Two years it's been killing these girls.
translation.it: Uccide queste ragazze da due anni.

translation.en: Breaks my heart.
Well, Lord McIntyre, if I might suggest a little lunch. I think we've earned it.
translation.it: Ebbene, Lord McIntyre, suggerirei di andare a pranzo. Ce lo siamo meritato.

translation.en: [Enola] How did Sarah do it? Get into the office?
translation.it: Come ha fatto Sarah a entrare nell'ufficio?

translation.en: There was a fire at one of the stations. Foreman got distracted.
translation.it: Una postazione è andata a fuoco. Il supervisore si è distratto.

translation.en: Whose station?
Mae's?
Yes.
You're a good detective, Enola Holmes.
translation.it: Sei una brava investigatrice, Enola Holmes.

translation.en: [Enola] Everyone thinks detecting is a profession littered with rules,
translation.it: Si pensa che gli investigatori abbiano molte regole,

translation.en: but in truth, there's only one.
translation.it: ma in realtà ce n'è solo una.

translation.en: Pull on every loose thread you find.
translation.it: Sciogliere ogni nodo in cui ci si imbatte.

translation.en: [Enola] She's a loose thread.
So I'm pulling at her.
-What a pleasant evening. -Young lady, I'm afraid I'm married.
translation.it: Salve, signore. Che bella serata. Mi spiace, signorina. Sono sposato.

translation.en: Hello, dearie. Forgot your ticket?
translation.it: Salve, tesoro. Avete scordato il biglietto?

translation.en: That's tuppence for a sweet, cheating face like yours.
translation.it: Per un visino dolce come il vostro sono due penny.

translation.en: [woman] Ha'penny a piece.
translation.it: Mezzo penny al pezzo! Vero toffee!

translation.en: -Genuine toffee. -[man] Out of my way, girl.
translation.it: Mezzo penny al pezzo! Vero toffee! Forza, ragazza.

translation.en: [woman] Ha'penny a piece.
[Enola] Where are you, Mae?
[man] Excuse me, sir.
[announcer] And here she comes!
♪ Where did you get that hat? Where did you get that tile? ♪
translation.it: Dove hai preso quella tuba? Dove hai preso quel cappello?

translation.en: ♪ Isn't it a nobby one And just the proper style? ♪
translation.it: Non ha uno stile nobile e di alto livello?

translation.en: ♪ I should like to have one Just the same as that ♪
translation.it: Vorrei tanto averne uno Proprio come quello

translation.en: ♪ Where'er I go, they shout "Hello, where did you get that hat?" ♪
translation.it: Ovunque vada, gridano: "Ehi! Dove hai preso quel cappello?"

translation.en: ♪ Where'er I go, they shout "Hello, where did you get that hat?" ♪
translation.it: Ovunque vada, gridano: "Ehi! Dove hai preso quel cappello?"

translation.en: ♪ Where did you get that hat? Where did you get that tile? ♪
translation.it: Dove hai preso quella tuba? Dove hai preso quel cappello?

translation.en: ♪ Isn't it a nobby one And just the proper style? ♪
translation.it: Non ha uno stile nobile e di alto livello?

translation.en: ♪ I should like to have one Just the same as that ♪
translation.it: Vorrei tanto averne uno Proprio come quello

translation.en: ♪ Where'er I go, they shout "Hello, where did you get that hat?" ♪
translation.it: Ovunque vada, gridano: "Ehi! Dove hai preso quel cappello?"

translation.en: [announcer] And now, all the way from Shanghai,
Mr. Li and his world of illusions!
translation.it: il signor Lee e il suo mondo di illusioni!

translation.en: You the foozler who took my pan stick?
translation.it: Hai preso tu il mio fondotinta?

translation.en: Um, no. I'm looking for a girl called M--
translation.it: No, cerco una ragazza di nome…

translation.en: She worked two jobs, you see.
Some place called The Stag Antlers.
translation.it: In un posto chiamato Corna di Cervo.

translation.en: You got five seconds to tell me why you're here.
translation.it: Dimmi subito cosa ci fai qui.

translation.en: [panting] Did Sarah work here?
She did, didn't she? And Bessie doesn't know.
translation.it: Sì, vero? E Bessie non lo sa.

translation.en: There's plenty Bessie don't know. And plenty you don't need to tell her.
translation.it: Bessie non sa molte cose. E vedi di non dirglielo.

translation.en: I know you helped her into that office. She took those pages. Why?
translation.it: L'hai aiutata a entrare nell'ufficio. Perché ha rubato quelle pagine?

translation.en: -What's happened to her? -Just leave us be, all right?
translation.it: - Cosa le è successo? - Lasciaci in pace.

translation.en: Posh girls like you don't belong in this fight.
translation.it: Le snob come te non devono immischiarsi.

translation.en: Posh or not, one thing I am good at is fighting.
translation.it: Che sia snob o meno, so combattere.

translation.en: Now tell me, where is she hiding and what does she know?
translation.it: Ora dimmi, dove si nasconde e cosa sa?

translation.en: You got more to you than I thought.
[clears throat] Whatever this is, Mae is on stage in 30 ticks,
translation.it: Qualunque cosa stia succedendo, Mae deve salire sul palco tra 30 secondi

translation.en: and she's still dressed as a gent.
translation.it: ed è ancora vestita da gentiluomo.

translation.en: So let go of her, now.
-Get her out of here. -[man] Be my pleasure.
[chuckles] Come on.
Where did Sarah Chapman do her makeup?
[man] Full of secrets that one, and not a bad actress.
translation.it: Aveva molti segreti ed era una brava attrice.

translation.en: I'd have given her the boot if she weren't so good,
translation.it: L'avrei cacciata se non fosse stata così brava,

translation.en: but she did attract the men with big pockets.
Always useful that. Shift it.
Which men?
There was this one gent, society type, and he came regular.
translation.it: C'era un gentiluomo, un tipo mondano che veniva spesso.

translation.en: Very keen on him she was. He'd send flowers, letters.
translation.it: Lui le piaceva molto. Mandava fiori, lettere…

translation.en: His name?
Never gave one.
[chuckles] You see, they all think there's hope. That love is coming their way.
translation.it: Pensano tutte che l'amore sia dietro l'angolo.

translation.en: But it never is.
Blokes like that, they want cheap, but they marry dear.
translation.it: Questi tizi vogliono le ragazze povere, ma sposano donne ricche.

translation.en: "As we two ate of the fruit of love…"
The fruit of love? Ugh.
"A bell did ring in the sky above"
translation.it: "Una campana fa suonare nel mio cuore

translation.en: "So wander that place With its blossoms white"
translation.it: Dunque recati nel luogo Dai bianchi boccioli

translation.en: "A chapel awaits us out of sight"
translation.it: La cappella ci attende, noi due soli"

translation.en: And a poppy. Is that his name?
translation.it: E un papavero. Che richiami il suo nome?

translation.en: Why did she leave?
Did she run away with this fellow?
Or is she running from him?
I hope it's the latter. His poetry is extremely bad.
translation.it: Spero nella seconda opzione. È un pessimo poeta.

translation.en: Be away with you, boy.
-Sherlock? -Enola.
What are you doing here? It's not safe. There are scary people about.
translation.it: Cosa ci fai qui? Non è sicuro. Ci sono persone pericolose, qui.

translation.en: -Yes, let me know when you meet one. -[Sherlock sighs drunkenly]
translation.it: Sì, dimmi quando ne incontri una.

translation.en: -Brother, are you quite yourself? -I'm fine.
translation.it: - Fratello, ti senti bene? - Sto bene.

translation.en: It was just a disagreement over a glass of wine
translation.it: È stato un semplice disaccordo circa un bicchiere di vino

translation.en: and whose wine it was. And, uh…
translation.it: e su a chi appartenesse. E…

translation.en: I find after wine, it's very difficult to make your arms and legs move.
translation.it: trovo alquanto difficile far muovere braccia e gambe.

translation.en: Let's get you home.
I don't usually imbibe, but I'm on a case, you see.
translation.it: Di norma non bevo, ma sto indagando su un caso.

translation.en: -It's proven rather tricky. -[Enola] Cab.
-[Sherlock] Hello. -[Enola] Hello.
-[Sherlock] Where are we going? -221 Baker Street.
translation.it: - Dove andiamo? - Al 221 di Baker Street.

translation.en: [Enola] As it turns out, my brother is medievally heavy.
translation.it: A quanto pare, mio fratello è assurdamente pesante.

translation.en: It's like carrying a dead horse on which sits another dead horse.
translation.it: È come trasportare un cavallo morto con sopra un altro cavallo morto.

translation.en: That's A, and I'm B.
translation.it: Quello è l'A, io sono al B.

translation.en: I didn't know you had steps.
translation.it: Non sapevo ci fossero delle scale.

translation.en: One should always have steps to avoid people stepping on you.
translation.it: A forza di salire scale si arriva in cielo.

translation.en: That's a tip. You should probably write that down.
[sighs] All right. Lift your right leg.
Now your left.
Better leg, the left. You should write that down.
translation.it: La sinistra è la gamba migliore. Dovresti scrivertelo.

translation.en: [Sherlock] Ha! Home. Well done, Sherlock.
I can do it.
See?
-Oh, but it's such a mess. -It's perfect. Don't touch anything.
translation.it: - Quanto disordine. - È perfetto. Non toccare niente.

translation.en: [Enola] What are you investigating?
[Sherlock] None of your business. I work alone. It's private.
translation.it: Non sono affari tuoi. Lavoro da solo.

translation.en: Now shh, I'm thinking. One should never be interrupted when thinking.
translation.it: Ora taci, sto pensando. Mai interrompere qualcuno che pensa.

translation.en: -Oh. You should-- -Write that down?
Don't go in there.
[Enola] Sherlock's latest case.
Fascinating.
And why, pray, have you moved everything?
translation.it: E perché, di grazia, hai spostato tutto?

translation.en: -Nothing looks different to me. -Nothing looks different? Ev--
translation.it: - Mi sembra tutto uguale. - Ti sembra tutto uguale? È…

translation.en: Your head is sore? I can't think why.
translation.it: Ti duole la testa? Chissà perché.

translation.en: [Sherlock] This is why I don't have people in my rooms.
translation.it: Per questo non faccio mai entrare nessuno.

translation.en: Look what you've done. My papers are entirely out of order.
translation.it: Guarda cos'hai fatto. Le mie carte sono tutte fuori posto.

translation.en: Your case, it's vexing you.
Seems to be an awful lot of question marks on that map of yours.
translation.it: Ci sono molti punti interrogativi sulla tua mappa.

translation.en: Dundee cake. Door.
-I will see you again. -Is that why you're drinking?
translation.it: - Ci vediamo. - È per questo che bevi?

translation.en: I'm more than certain… [sniffs] …it's not so old.
translation.it: Sono più che certo che non sia tanto vecchia.

translation.en: -Maybe I can help. -You can help by leaving.
Huh. Yes. The world will be a much safer place
if we don't see the inside of Sherlock Holmes, only the out.
translation.it: se qualcuno vedesse il vero Sherlock Holmes.

translation.en: Crazy idea.
Have you ever considered a flatmate?
-For what purpose? -To stop you descending into this.
translation.it: - A che scopo? - Per impedirti di finire così.

translation.en: Strange how those seeking advice so often like to dispense it.
translation.it: Strano come chi cerca consigli finisca spesso per dispensarli.

translation.en: Did I ask for advice? I found you on the street, drunk.
translation.it: Ti ho chiesto consiglio? - Ti ho trovato per strada, ubriaco. - Lasciati osservare.

translation.en: -Now what may I observe about you? -We're not playing this game.
translation.it: - Ti ho trovato per strada, ubriaco. - Lasciati osservare. - Non mi va di giocare. - Scarpe e capelli in disordine.

translation.en: Shoes a state. Hair's not much better.
translation.it: - Non mi va di giocare. - Scarpe e capelli in disordine.

translation.en: -You and Mycroft are so similar. -You need to wash your clothes.
translation.it: - Sei proprio come Mycroft. - Hai i vestiti sporchi.

translation.en: -Unwilling to look past-- -You are pale--
-Stop! -And then there's your fingernails.
translation.it: Smettila! Poi ci sono le tue unghie.

translation.en: -Why are you working in a match factory? -What?
translation.it: - Lavori in una fabbrica di fiammiferi? - Cosa?

translation.en: Last night, they were dirty with green traces. This morning, they are black.
translation.it: Ieri sera erano sporche di verde, stamattina di nero.

translation.en: The phosphorous from the match-making has mixed with oxygen.
translation.it: Il fosforo dei fiammiferi si è mescolato all'ossigeno.

translation.en: I wasn't in such a state as to not see that.
translation.it: Non ero in condizioni tali da non accorgermene.

translation.en: -How did you-- -[Sherlock] And your neck is red.
translation.it: - Come hai… - E sei rossa sul collo.

translation.en: Someone has gripped it or held a knife against…
translation.it: L'hanno afferrato o ti hanno puntato un col…

translation.en: Are you involved in something dangerous? You are still my ward.
translation.it: Sei coinvolta in qualcosa di pericoloso? Sono ancora il tuo tutore.

translation.en: If you need my help, my offer remains on the table.
translation.it: Se ti serve aiuto, la mia offerta resta valida.

translation.en: Don't be so desperate to prove yourself, Enola.
translation.it: Non essere così smaniosa di farti valere.

translation.en: I am not desperate, and I don't need your or anyone's help.
translation.it: Non sono smaniosa e non mi serve l'aiuto tuo o di nessuno.

translation.en: But this I will have.
[Enola] How dare he? How dare he lecture me?
translation.it: Come osa? Come osa farmi la predica?

translation.en: When he can't even solve his own case and he lives in a bed of flummoxing papers and bewildering mold.
translation.it: Non riesce nemmeno a risolvere il suo caso e vive sommerso da cartacce e muffa.

translation.en: How dare he claim I'm desperate? It is not true.
translation.it: Come osa darmi della smaniosa? Non è vero.

translation.en: -And this is not fair. -[Tewkesbury] Enola?
It is you.
And it is you.
[Tewkesbury] How are you?
Are you well? You look…
I'm on a case. Undercover. Forget I told you that piece of information.
translation.it: Ho un caso. Sono sotto copertura. Ma tu non dovresti saperlo.

translation.en: It's the strangest thing. I could have sworn I've seen you here before.
translation.it: Sai, è proprio strano. Giurerei di averti già vista qui.

translation.en: Is that right?
Well, this is my… My route through to the Lords.
translation.it: Passo sempre di qui per andare alla Camera dei Lord.

translation.en: Is it? [chuckles awkwardly] How lovely.
Well, I… I breakfast here on occasion.
translation.it: Ebbene, ogni tanto faccio colazione qui.

translation.en: I mean, yes, it's a lovely place. I-I know the gardener here.
translation.it: Sì, è un luogo incantevole. Conosco il giardiniere.

translation.en: We've been discussing what to sow for next year's crop.
translation.it: Discutiamo di cosa seminare l'anno prossimo.

translation.en: Some fine sunflowers.
Uh, Sweet Williams, for their lovely vivid reds.
translation.it: garofani Sweet William, di un bel rosso vivo…

translation.en: I've seen all you're doing.
Oh. Well, it's… It's nothing. In the society pages.
translation.it: - Beh, non è niente. - …nelle cronache mondane.

translation.en: You are quite the eligible bachelor.
Don't believe all you read.
I wrote to you.
You didn't reply.
I… was busy.
Starting my own business. A perpetual challenge.
translation.it: Ad avviare la mia attività. Una sfida continua.

translation.en: Perhaps, not something you'd understand.
-Well, Enola, if you need help-- -I do not.
translation.it: - Beh, se ti serve aiuto… - Non mi serve.

translation.en: Should my problem become horticultural, I shall seek you out.
translation.it: Se avessi problemi di orticultura, verrò da te.

translation.en: Right.
Well, you know where to find me
should a plant go missing.
I hope you enjoy your breakfast.
Yeah.
[whispering] Is he looking back?
[in normal voice] Oh. Good, he isn't.
I don't come here every day. Just on days when I feel a need.
translation.it: Non vengo qui tutti i giorni. Solo quando ne sento il bisogno.

translation.en: And sometimes he doesn't take this path. Sometimes he takes the parallel one.
translation.it: E non prende sempre questa strada. A volte prende quella parallela.

translation.en: -[sighs] -[echoing] You know where to find me.
"You know where to find me."
"Out of sight"
"The chapel awaits us With its blossoms white"
translation.it: La cappella ci attende Dai bianchi boccioli"

translation.en: "As we two ate of the fruit of love"
"As we two ate…"
"Two ate." Two-eight.
Twenty-eight.
"A bell did ring in the sky above"
translation.it: "Una campana fa suonare nel mio cuore"

translation.en: Bell?
"So wander that place"
Bell. Place. "Out of sight"
translation.it: Campana. Luogo. Bell Place. "Noi due soli"

translation.en: 28 Bell Place, Whitechapel! [squeals]
translation.it: Il 28 di Bell Place, a Whitechapel!

translation.en: -Oh, sorry. -[baby cries]
The game has found its feet again.
translation.it: Il gioco si fa di nuovo interessante.

translation.en: I will not lie.
There is a certain satisfaction that you feel as a detective when your case comes closer to resolution.
translation.it: Si prova una certa soddisfazione quando si è vicini a risolvere un caso.

translation.en: Like sewing a new skirt…
…which I don't do, or teaching a dog to sit.
translation.it: cosa che non faccio, o insegnare a un cane a sedersi.

translation.en: You begin to glow with the acknowledgement of a job well done.
translation.it: Ci si sente compiaciuti per un lavoro ben fatto.

translation.en: [boy] There's a new Holmes in town.
translation.it: C'è una nuova Holmes in città.

translation.en: That's right. Sherlock Holmes has met his match.
translation.it: Esatto. Qualcuno all'altezza di Sherlock Holmes!

translation.en: My name will be known, and Bessie will have a sister once again.
translation.it: Io diventerò famosa e Bessie riavrà sua sorella.

translation.en: And that is a job well…
translation.it: E questo è un lavoro ben…

translation.en: done.
[Enola] What happened here?
Mr. Poppy.
-[Mae gasps] -[gasps] Oh, Mae.
What happened? Who did this to you?
translation.it: Cos'è successo? Chi ti ha fatto questo?

translation.en: -Was it him, Sarah's man? Mae! -[tense music continues]
translation.it: È stato lui, l'uomo di Sarah? Mae.

translation.en: No, no. It's all right.
I'll fetch a doctor for you.
No! No, no, no.
Come back.
Miss Holmes?
-[Enola] Inspector Lestrade. -[Lestrade sighs]
-Enola Holmes. -[Enola] Lestrade.
-She… She's-- -Dead.
How'd that happen?
Oh, no, no, no. I'm investigating a case. A disappearance of a girl.
translation.it: No, sto indagando su un caso. Una ragazza è scomparsa.

translation.en: -What, that girl? -No. No, no, no. H-Her name is Mae.
translation.it: - Quella lì? - No. No, lei si chiama Mae.

translation.en: She worked at the Paragon Theater, the matchstick factory.
translation.it: Lavorava al Paragon Theater e alla fabbrica di fiammiferi.

translation.en: -She was a dancer. She's friends-- -[clanging]
translation.it: Era una ballerina. È amica di…

translation.en: [Lestrade] Superintendent Grail.
-Good morning. -[Lestrade] Good morning, sir.
I was sent to investigate a possible disturbance.
translation.it: Mi hanno mandato a indagare su un problema.

translation.en: Someone heard some screams, and then I discovered this young lady.
translation.it: Hanno sentito delle grida e ho trovato questa ragazza.

translation.en: Her name?
Uh, his sister. A detective too.
[sighs] Good God, another one.
Shouldn't you be in finishing school?
Investigating the disappearance of a…
-Sarah Chapman. -Yeah.
Sarah Chapman? Well, well, how intriguing. So am I.
translation.it: Sarah Chapman? Molto interessante. Anch'io indago su di lei.

translation.en: -She's wanted for theft and blackmail. -Blackmail?
translation.it: - È ricercata per furto e ricatto. - Ricatto?

translation.en: Yes, detective.
Still warm. No rigor mortis.
translation.it: È ancora calda. Niente rigor mortis.

translation.en: -When were the screams heard, inspector? -Ten past the hour, sir.
translation.it: - Quando si sono sentite le urla? - Allo scoccare dei dieci minuti.

translation.en: When did you arrive, detective?
A-Around the same time.
[Grail] Even more intriguing.
Uh, no, I was trying to suppress the blood. I-I was trying to save her.
translation.it: No, cercavo di fermare il sangue. Cercavo di salvarla.

translation.en: Or trying to get information out of her.
Give her a search, inspector.
Oh, I couldn't. I can't pat her down, sir.
translation.it: Oh, non potrei mai. Non posso perquisirla, signore.

translation.en: Come along, Lestrade. Let's not be coy about this.
translation.it: Forza, Lestrade. Non fate il timido.

translation.en: -She's a detective. She knows the rules. -[Lestrade] Yes.
translation.it: È un'investigatrice. - Conosce le regole. - Sì.

translation.en: [sighs] Um…
Give me that bag!
What's this? My evidence.
translation.it: - Questo cos'è? - Una prova che ho trovato.

translation.en: And that?
It's nothing. Then why are you hiding it?
translation.it: - Non è niente. - Allora perché lo nascondete?

translation.en: Found at a murder scene with a freshly dead corpse,
translation.it: Trovata sulla scena di un omicidio con un cadavere fresco.

translation.en: harboring evidence isn't gonna look good.
translation.it: Nascondere delle prove non è una buona idea.

translation.en: Superintendent Grail, you can't believe--
What can't I believe, missy?
That young ladies don't have the hands for killing?
translation.it: Che le giovani donne sono capaci di uccidere?

translation.en: Now, give them here.
-Go on! -[Grail] After her, all of ya!
Why ever would she ever do that?
-[policeman] Get out of the way! Move! -[woman shrieks]
-[policeman] Stop that girl! -[horse whinnies]
You've seen this before.
Ah. Lestrade of Scotland Yard. You remember me, I hope.
translation.it: Lestrade, di Scotland Yard. Vi ricorderete di me.

translation.en: We're looking for your sister. She's caused a bit of trouble.
translation.it: Cerchiamo vostra sorella. Ha causato qualche problema.

translation.en: May I?
Is it, sir?
Is it?
Take it. I have others.
Take it? I can't. [chuckles]
I can. I can't.
Perhaps I can.
And this, the famous fiddle?
translation.it: E questo è il famoso violino?

translation.en: That I do not have two of.
translation.it: Di quello ne ho uno solo.

translation.en: Perhaps you can explain what you believe Enola has done.
translation.it: Volete spiegarmi cosa credete abbia fatto Enola?

translation.en: I wish I was at liberty to say, sir.
Do you mind?
Oh, your latest case.
What's it concerning?
Is it another Brixton Strangler?
Or a Periwinkle? Don't tell me it's a Clerkenwell.
translation.it: O è più come il caso Periwinkle? Non avrete per le mani un Clerkenwell?

translation.en: What evidence do they have against my sister?
Perhaps, uh, you tell me yours and I'll tell you mine.
translation.it: Ditemi cos'avete e io farò lo stesso.

translation.en: Government case, some missing money.
translation.it: Caso di governo, manca del denaro.

translation.en: Now you. [Lestrade] Super wants to talk her.
translation.it: - Tocca a voi. - Il sovrintendente vuole solo parlarle.

translation.en: -[Sherlock] Why? -Just following orders, Mr. Holmes.
translation.it: Perché? Io eseguo gli ordini, sig. Holmes. O posso chiamarvi Sherlock?

translation.en: Or may I call you Sherlock?
translation.it: Io eseguo gli ordini, sig. Holmes. O posso chiamarvi Sherlock?

translation.en: My father thought it distinguished, and it is rather.
translation.it: Mio padre lo trovava distinto, e direi che aveva ragione.

translation.en: [Lestrade] Well, anyway, should you ever wish to call me that…
translation.it: Comunque, se mai voleste chiamarmi così…

translation.en: Right.
As you were.
Oh dear.
My mistake. I should have warned you I was opening it.
Dare I ask?
Good afternoon. May I ask a favor?
translation.it: Buon pomeriggio. Mi faresti un favore?

translation.en: Never mind. Tell me everything.
-A government case? -No.
[Lestrade] Is it another Brixton Strangler?
Or… Or a Periwinkle?
translation.it: O è più come il caso Periwinkle?

translation.en: "You tell me yours and I'll tell you mine."
translation.it: "Ditemi cos'avete e io farò lo stesso."

translation.en: He's a ninny. I needed to know what he had on you.
translation.it: È un idiota. Dovevo sapere cos'ha su di te.

translation.en: Money. Unaccounted transfers going in and out of government offices.
translation.it: Denaro. Una serie di trasferimenti fantasma.

translation.en: My theory is either bribery, extortion, or blackmail.
translation.it: Si tratta di corruzione, estorsione o ricatto.

translation.en: And what have you found?
Separate filings from five different accounts
going via the Treasury into one private bank.
translation.it: che passano dal Tesoro e finiscono in una banca privata.

translation.en: -So someone is getting rich from this? -Yes.
translation.it: - Quindi qualcuno si sta arricchendo? - Sì.

translation.en: -Who? -No name.
Just a number.
I visited the bank and inquired. The money disappeared,
translation.it: Ho chiesto alla banca. I soldi sono spariti e finiti in un'altra banca

translation.en: arriving at another bank, and then another,
translation.it: I soldi sono spariti e finiti in un'altra banca e poi in un'altra, un'altra e un'altra ancora.

translation.en: and another, and another, and another, and another.
translation.it: e poi in un'altra, un'altra e un'altra ancora.

translation.en: Every one of them hidden using different account numbers.
translation.it: Ogni transazione è occultata da numeri di conto diversi.

translation.en: Twenty-seven in total.
-Well, what can you deduce from that? -Three things.
translation.it: - Ebbene, cosa ne deduci? - Tre cose.

translation.en: Firstly, the man's a game player, perhaps a genius in mathematics,
translation.it: Primo, quest'uomo ama giocare. Forse è un genio della matematica,

translation.en: capable of covering his traces at every turn.
translation.it: capace di coprire le sue tracce.

translation.en: Secondly, the sources are varied.
Five banks, south of the river, but no clear link between them.
translation.it: Cinque banche a sud del fiume, ma tutte slegate fra loro.

translation.en: All anonymous.
All going into one pocket.
translation.it: Tutto va a finire nelle stesse tasche.

translation.en: And the third?
He knows I'm onto him.
What? How?
Every time I pull a thread, it loosens, vanishes,
translation.it: Ogni volta che tiro un filo, questo si allenta, svanisce

translation.en: reappears somewhere else. He's leading me a merry dance.
translation.it: e riappare altrove. Mi fa ballare a vuoto. È…

translation.en: It's…
translation.it: Mi fa ballare a vuoto. È…

translation.en: It's infuriating.
So no leads whatsoever?
One. A week before the first transfer,
translation.it: Una. Poco prima del primo trasferimento

translation.en: there was a break-in at the Treasury office by a man in a taper crown hat.
translation.it: un uomo con un borsalino ha fatto irruzione al Tesoro.

translation.en: [Enola] A taper crown hat. -What was taken? -A document.
They won't talk about it. Sensitive information presumably.
translation.it: Un documento. Non dicono quale, informazioni sensibili.

translation.en: But how it connects to all of this has so far eluded me.
translation.it: Tuttavia mi sfugge come questo si colleghi a tutto il resto.

translation.en: Your turn. I hope the blood's not yours.
translation.it: Ora tu. Spero che il sangue non sia tuo.

translation.en: I'm looking for a girl, Sarah Chapman. Her sister employed me. Bessie.
translation.it: Sto cercando una ragazza, Sarah Chapman. Mi ha assunta sua sorella Bessie.

translation.en: She worked at Lyons match factory by day, and the music hall at night.
translation.it: Lavorava alla fabbrica di fiammiferi e al teatro.

translation.en: She has a lover,
whose flat I visited.
He'd given her this.
28 Bell Place?
Whitechapel, yes.
And there I found her friend,
translation.it: E lì ho trovato la sua amica,

translation.en: murdered.
And who killed her? This poppy fellow?
translation.it: E chi l'ha uccisa? Il tipo del papavero?

translation.en: I suspect so.
Perhaps he kidnapped Sarah and her friend discovered it.
translation.it: Forse ha rapito Sarah e la sua amica l'ha scoperto.

translation.en: [scoffs] Love. What it does to people.
translation.it: L'amore. Fa cose inaudite alle persone.

translation.en: -How was she killed? -A kitchen knife.
-Did you touch this weapon? -No.
Then why did you run? I found more evidence on her.
translation.it: - Allora perché fuggire? - Ho trovato delle prove.

translation.en: This policeman wanted it.
-He has this walk. -Grail.
We have a history.
[Enola] This was in her pocket.
It's as bad as the poem.
-Leave it with me. -No.
It's mine, and it's important.
Grail said she had stolen something and that she was blackmailing them.
translation.it: Secondo Grail aveva rubato qualcosa e li stava ricattando.

translation.en: -Though Sarah wouldn't do that. -You don't know this person.
translation.it: - Ma Sarah non lo farebbe. - Che ne sai? Non la conosci.

translation.en: I feel I do. You came here running from the police.
translation.it: - Mi sembra di conoscerla. - Sei scappata dalla polizia.

translation.en: Someone is already dead, and you are now a suspect in a murder case.
translation.it: È già morta una persona e ora sei sospettata di omicidio.

translation.en: You've let your emotions get the better of you. Stay here. Don't leave. I will look into this.
translation.it: Ti sei fatta prendere dalle emozioni. Resta qui e non uscire. Indagherò io.

translation.en: But Sarah Chapman is my responsibility. No one else cares for these girls.
translation.it: Sarah Chapman è una mia responsabilità. Nessuno pensa a queste ragazze. L'ho promesso alla sorella.

translation.en: I promised her sister.
translation.it: Nessuno pensa a queste ragazze. L'ho promesso alla sorella.

translation.en: The first mistake a detective makes is to make it about themselves and not the case.
translation.it: Il primo errore di un investigatore è mettere il proprio ego prima del caso.

translation.en: Enola, I know you're not a fan of unnecessary advice,
translation.it: Enola, so che non apprezzi i consigli superflui,

translation.en: but please…
…don't turn into me.
I should probably write that down.
[girl] Matches, matches! Come buy your matches!
translation.it: Fiammiferi! Venite a comprare dei fiammiferi!

translation.en: Only a penny a box.
Matches, matches! Only a penny a box.
translation.it: Fiammiferi! Solo un penny a scatola.

translation.en: Come buy your matches!
[Mae] Posh girls like you don't belong in this fight.
translation.it: Le snob come te non devono immischiarsi.

translation.en: We don't need help from people like you.
translation.it: Non ci serve l'aiuto di gente come te.

translation.en: [man] See, they all think there's hope. That love is coming their way.
translation.it: Pensano tutte che l'amore sia dietro l'angolo.

translation.en: But it never is.
Gents like that, they want cheap, but they marry dear.
translation.it: Questi tizi vogliono le ragazze povere, ma sposano donne ricche.

translation.en: [Enola] So, Poppy, you're a gent, are you?
translation.it: Allora, Papavero, sei un gentiluomo, vero?

translation.en: And a well-heeled one to afford a love nest like that.
translation.it: E benestante, per permetterti un nido d'amore così.

translation.en: -[policeman] Sir-- -Don't be ridiculous.
[Sherlock] There was a break-in at the Treasury office
translation.it: Prima del primo trasferimento un uomo con un borsalino

translation.en: by a man in a taper crown hat.
Five banks, south of the river, but no clear link between them.
translation.it: Cinque banche a sud del fiume, ma tutte slegate fra loro.

translation.en: "Match makers ball."
"Hosted by Henry and Hilda Lyon. 12 Marchmont Square."
translation.it: Organizzato da Henry e Hilda Lyon al 12 di Marchmont Square."

translation.en: Does that date mean anything to you?
It's not a date at all.
"Their eldest son, William Lyon, will be leading the first…"
translation.it: "Il loro figlio maggiore William Lyon guiderà il primo…"

translation.en: Sweet Williams, for their wonderfully vivid reds.
translation.it: Garofani Sweet William, di un bel rosso vivo.

translation.en: Our ladies are working at the highest level of production and efficiency.
translation.it: Le nostre ragazze lavorano al massimo dell'efficienza.

translation.en: -Are they not, William? -Yes, Father.
translation.it: - Non è così, William? - Sì, padre.

translation.en: And all along, I thought you were a poppy.
translation.it: E io che ti credevo un papavero.

translation.en: Let's see how sweet you are, Sweet William.
translation.it: Vediamo quanto sei dolce, Sweet William.

translation.en: I'm going to a ball.
'Tis I.
'Tis not I.
Which, when you're wanted by the police, is most useful.
translation.it: È molto utile, quando la polizia ti cerca.

translation.en: [man] Pray silence for his Lordship Viscount McIntyre.
translation.it: Fate silenzio per Sua Eccellenza, il visconte McIntyre.

translation.en: I-I'm sorry to break apart this glorious occasion,
translation.it: Mi spiace interrompere questa bella serata,

translation.en: but, well, I'm a politician.
Any chance to stand on a stage, I'll always take it.
translation.it: Colgo sempre l'occasione di salire su un palco.

translation.en: [Charles McIntyre] And I must speak to thank our host
translation.it: E ci tengo a ringraziare il nostro padrone di casa

translation.en: and applaud his achievements.
translation.it: e ad applaudire i suoi successi.

translation.en: No masks, no matter.
For Henry Lyon turns all before him into gold.
translation.it: Perché Henry Lyon trasforma tutto ciò che tocca in oro.

translation.en: Ha, nonsense! Pewter at best.
What he has done with matches is legendary.
translation.it: Ciò che ha fatto coi fiammiferi è leggendario.

translation.en: In two years, he's turned red into black.
translation.it: In due anni, ha trasformato il rosso in nero.

translation.en: Or should I say, red into white?
translation.it: O dovrei dire il rosso in bianco?

translation.en: And to have this humble man turn his attention to typhoid and the working poor,
translation.it: E con umiltà rivolge la sua attenzione ai malati di tifo e ai lavoratori poveri,

translation.en: raising funds, diagnosing cases in the community,
translation.it: raccogliendo fondi e diagnosticando casi nella comunità.

translation.en: I'm overwhelmed. I'm simply overwhelmed.
Ladies and gentlemen, I give you Henry Lyon.
translation.it: Signore e signori, vi presento Henry Lyon.

translation.en: And to his fine son, his heir, William.
translation.it: E suo figlio, il suo erede, William.

translation.en: To the future.
-[all] To the future. -[McIntyre] May it ever be bright.
translation.it: Al futuro! Che sia sempre luminoso.

translation.en: [McIntyre] Right, Henry, light us up.
[Mr. Lyon] Gladly.
[McIntyre] Now go and enjoy yourselves.
I believe I've seen that dress somewhere before.
translation.it: Giurerei di aver già visto quell'abito.

translation.en: -[girls giggle] -Oh yes, last year.
I think it's charming, elegant. I think you are kind.
translation.it: - Io lo trovo delizioso ed elegante. - E io vi trovo molto gentile.

translation.en: [Enola] Gentlemen.
Ma'am.
Good evening.
This is a wonderful occasion, is it not?
translation.it: Che occasione meravigliosa, non è vero?

translation.en: I mean, the guests are just… delightful.
translation.it: Insomma, gli ospiti sono davvero incantevoli.

translation.en: And the orchestra is most tuneful.
translation.it: E l'orchestra è in perfetta armonia.

translation.en: I was wondering if
I might be able to speak to you, Mr. Lyon.
translation.it: se potessi parlare con voi, signor Lyon.

translation.en: -Uh, have I said something wrong? -Where is your chaperone?
translation.it: Ho detto qualcosa di male? - Dov'è il vostro accompagnatore? - Accompagnatore?

translation.en: Chaperone?
My dear, you can hardly expect my son to talk to you unaccompanied.
translation.it: Non crederete mica che mio figlio parlerà con voi da solo.

translation.en: -[man] Oh. -[woman sighs]
-[man retches] -[woman groans]
I cannot talk to you without a chaperone?
translation.it: Non posso parlarvi senza un accompagnatore?

translation.en: No, of course not.
Honestly?
Honestly?
Who is this woman?
Well, they are talking.
They are dancing.
Good evening, my dear.
[Enola] Yes. How foolish of me.
translation.it: Sì. È stato sciocco da parte mia.

translation.en: Good evening.
It could be claimed, with some justification,
translation.it: Si potrebbe dire, con qualche giustificazione,

translation.en: that I might have prepared more thoroughly. But dancing is not one of my core strengths.
translation.it: che avrei potuto prepararmi meglio, ma non sono molto brava a ballare.

translation.en: Well, except…
♪ Knees up Mother Brown Under the table you must go ♪
translation.it: È ora di far festa, Madre Brown È ora di bere a più non posso

translation.en: You see my situation.
[Sherlock] Who are you?
[Sherlock] The man's a game player.
Separate filings from five different accounts.
Capable of covering his traces at every turn. One private bank.
translation.it: Capace di coprire le sue tracce. Una banca privata.

translation.en: Vanishes and reappears. No name. Just a number.
translation.it: Svanisce e riappare. Nessun nome. Solo un numero.

translation.en: [Sherlock] Perhaps a genius in mathematics.
translation.it: Forse è un genio della matematica.

translation.en: [echoing] Leading me a merry dance.
It's a cipher.
The polka.
The promenade. The two-step.
They're all dances.
[Sherlock] Dance, dance, dance, dance.
Twenty-seven, turn on…
[Sherlock] Yes. The Language of the Dance.
"Twenty-seven dances."
I've got you.
Dance one, then 14. 22.
Terrible, aren't they? These things.
All pompidou and popinjay.
Have we met somewhere before? I feel I recognize you from somewhere.
translation.it: Ci siamo già incontrate, per caso? Ho l'impressione di avervi già vista.

translation.en: [chuckles awkwardly] I simply have one of those faces.
private secretary to Lord McIntyre, Treasury Minister.
translation.it: segretaria privata di Lord McIntyre, il ministro del Tesoro.

translation.en: You mustn't let them concern you.
It's just a performance.
Everyone here is playing a part. Testing each other.
translation.it: Tutti, qui, recitano una parte. Si mettono alla prova a vicenda.

translation.en: Winning.
Losing.
And it's fun,
once you know the rules.
What are they doing with those fans?
[Miss Troy] Sending messages.
Saying everything that is forbidden,
translation.it: Dicono tutto ciò che è proibito…

translation.en: or too embarrassing to say aloud.
translation.it: o troppo imbarazzante per dirlo ad alta voce.

translation.en: Thank you for the lesson.
It's a lesson hard learned.
Without power, we women must rely on our wits for our fortune,
translation.it: Senza potere, noi donne dobbiamo affidarci all'ingegno,

translation.en: because our chances are short. Here.
translation.it: perché abbiamo meno possibilità. Ecco. Prendete il mio ventaglio.

translation.en: Take my fan.
I have no use for it.
And if you wish to speak to William,
translation.it: E se volete parlare con William…

translation.en: you could always try with that.
No, not… No, not you. Oh.
Help.
It would be my delight.
Really, there's no need to be rude.
translation.it: Non c'è bisogno di essere scortesi.

translation.en: [Enola] I-I didn't mean to.
-Your timing's impeccable! -Enola?
translation.it: - Il tuo tempismo è impeccabile! - Enola?

translation.en: Don't speak to me here, otherwise you'll be thrown onto the street.
translation.it: Non parlarmi qui o ti cacceranno via.

translation.en: -I need you to teach me to dance. -Teach you to dance? When?
translation.it: - Devi insegnarmi a ballare. - A ballare? Quando?

translation.en: -Teach me to dance now. -Wh…
You understand I've been learning since I was five?
translation.it: Sai che lo faccio da quando avevo cinque anni?

translation.en: Good. I'd feared you'd be a terrible teacher.
translation.it: Bene, temevo potessi essere un pessimo insegnante.

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -I'm looking for a murderer.
translation.it: - Cosa fai qui? - Sto cercando un assassino.

translation.en: Though I shouldn't have told you. Forget I told you that.
translation.it: Ma non avrei dovuto dirtelo. Dimenticalo.

translation.en: -I'm trying to save a girl's life. -Through dance?
translation.it: - Voglio salvare la vita a una ragazza. - Ballando?

translation.en: Please, Tewkesbury.
All right. Hold your back straight.
translation.it: Va bene. Tieni la schiena dritta.

translation.en: And I'll place my hand here and here.
Oh. Yes.
Hold your arm out.
Good.
Now, I will lead and you will follow.
translation.it: Ora, io conduco e tu mi segui.

translation.en: -That seems like a mistake. -Face over my shoulder.
translation.it: - Non mi sembra giusto. - Guarda oltre la mia spalla.

translation.en: And now, one, two, three.
Two, three. Two, three.
translation.it: Un, due, tre. Un, due, tre.

translation.en: Four, two, three. One, two, three.
translation.it: Quattro, due, tre. Un, due, tre.

translation.en: Two, three.
Good.
You seem different since last we spoke.
Tell me why you've been coming to the park. Why… Why watch me walk to the Lords?
translation.it: Dimmi perché vieni al parco. Perché mi osservi andare al lavoro?

translation.en: Simply keeping an eye on you, in case you get yourself into any more scrapes.
translation.it: Ti tengo d'occhio, nel caso finissi nei guai.

translation.en: -Getting thrown out of trains. -Enola--
translation.it: - Ti buttassero giù da un treno o… - Enola…

translation.en: You cannot be trusted to take care of yourself.
translation.it: Non sai prenderti cura di te.

translation.en: I'm a man now. You're a man when I tell you you're a man.
translation.it: - Ora sono un uomo. - Questo lo deciderò io.

translation.en: And the scrapes I find myself in are far less visceral.
translation.it: E i miei guai sono molto meno cruenti.

translation.en: [Tewkesbury] Now, come on.
Two, three. Two, three. Look into my eyes.
translation.it: Un, due, tre. Un, due, tre. Guardami negli occhi.

translation.en: The rhythm is always there.
Dancing is a trust, it's a union.
That's why I've always loved it, even when I was being tutored by my uncle.
translation.it: Per questo mi è sempre piaciuto, anche quando mi insegnava mio zio.

translation.en: That man likes a pork mustard pie. His breath…
translation.it: Gli piaceva il maiale alla senape. Il suo alito…

translation.en: Turn, two.
Turn. Feel it? I can feel it.
[Tewkesbury] Good.
-You dance well. -Perhaps I have a fine teacher.
translation.it: - Balli bene. - Forse ho un bravo insegnante.

translation.en: Though his breath has less mustard on it than I'd hoped. [chuckles]
translation.it: Anche se il suo alito non sa di senape.

translation.en: -[woman] We have an urgent situation. -[knocking continues]
I should go. You'll need a dance card.
translation.it: Meglio che vada. Ti serve un carnet di ballo.

translation.en: But I don't know enough.
-What does that mean? -You'll learn.
Don't touch the ginger cake. Plays hopscotch with your bowels.
translation.it: Non mangiate la torta allo zenzero o starete male!

translation.en: Hello.
-Mr. Lyon. -Yes.
I was wondering if we might have a dance this evening.
translation.it: Mi chiedevo se voleste ballare, stasera.

translation.en: My dance card is full.
May I see it?
Your last waltz is still free. How fitting.
translation.it: L'ultimo valzer è ancora libero. Perfetto.

translation.en: Would you mind?
Until then.
'Tis he.
You admire Lord Tewkesbury?
No!
[clears throat] No.
We are old friends.
I hear he's a good man, and a great reformer.
translation.it: So che è un brav'uomo e un gran riformatore.

translation.en: Well, if you wish to dance with him, you may have to wait.
translation.it: Potreste dover aspettare, per ballare con lui.

translation.en: There's quite a queue.
Yes, I mustn't lose my chance.
Good evening, Miss…? Tabitha.
Forgive me for interrupting. My name is Cicely.
translation.it: Lord Tewkesbury. Scusate l'interruzione. Mi chiamo Cicely.

translation.en: Um, your friend Tabitha suggested we might dance.
translation.it: La vostra amica Tabitha dice che dovremmo ballare insieme.

translation.en: Did she?
[man] Ladies and gentlemen, please take your partners for the last waltz.
translation.it: Signore e signori, unitevi ai vostri compagni per l'ultimo valzer.

translation.en: You know, I swear I know your face. What must it be?
translation.it: Giurerei di conoscere il vostro volto. Perché mai?

translation.en: We have never met before, but I've seen you looking. Why?
translation.it: Non ci siamo mai incontrati, ma ho notato che mi guardavate. Perché?

translation.en: [Enola] Of course. The Paragon Music Hall.
I saw you talking with a young woman there. Sarah Chapman.
translation.it: Vi ho visto parlare con una ragazza. Sarah Chapman.

translation.en: Dislocate from me and I will scream.
The police are onto you, Mr. Lyon. As it happens, they are onto us both.
translation.it: La polizia vi cerca, signor Lyon. Cercano anche me, in realtà.

translation.en: You were not invited here. What do you want?
translation.it: Non siete stata invitata. Cosa volete?

translation.en: [Enola] I'm a private detective, hired by Sarah's sister to find her.
translation.it: Sono un'investigatrice assunta dalla sorella di Sarah.

translation.en: Bessie hired you? You know Bessie?
translation.it: - Vi ha assunta Bessie? - Conoscete Bessie?

translation.en: Leave me be, please, or you will ruin everything.
translation.it: Lasciatemi in pace, vi prego, o rovinerete tutto.

translation.en: -How? What will I ruin? -They're watching.
translation.it: - E come? Cosa rovinerò? - Ci osservano.

translation.en: If you must persist with this, meet me in the library at midnight.
translation.it: Se proprio insistete, vediamoci in biblioteca a mezzanotte.

translation.en: Say nothing more now.
Midnight it is.
"Moriarty."
Who are you?
-My word, you do get in awkward places. -Why are you holding a poker?
translation.it: - Sei sempre nel posto sbagliato. - Cosa fai con l'attizzatoio?

translation.en: You must leave. I'm waiting for another.
Another you're scared of such that you need a weapon?
translation.it: E ti spaventa tanto da usare un'arma?

translation.en: You are always here when I don't want you to be.
And sometimes here when you do.
-What's the matter with you? -Nothing that need concern you.
translation.it: - Che succede? - Niente che ti riguardi.

translation.en: I like the look of the one you were dancing with. What's her name, Cicely?
translation.it: La tua dama aveva un bell'abito. Come si chiama, Cicely?

translation.en: She would make you an excellent wife.
Enola, I am concerned only for you.
Tewkesbury, if you're still here, you may scare him away.
-"Scare him"? All of this is over a man? -[sighs]
translation.it: Spaventarlo? Tutto questo è per un uomo?

translation.en: Just leave.
Enola Holmes, you're under arrest.
Try to escape, and we will make this difficult.
translation.it: Fuggite e vi renderemo la vita difficile.

translation.en: Let's make it quiet and spare the fine people any embarrassment.
translation.it: Quindi evitate ogni imbarazzo a questa brava gente.

translation.en: -Sir, whatever this is about, I'm sure-- -Murder, sir.
translation.it: - Di qualsiasi cosa si tratti… - Omicidio.

translation.en: It's about murder.
Tewkesbury, it's all right.
Constable, go on.
Keep them safe.
-Please. -[Lestrade] Come along.
-[woman] Oh, I say. -I knew she didn't belong here.
translation.it: Sapevo che non era una di noi.

translation.en: -Despicable. -[woman] Disgraceful.
Quite a party.
You danced with young Master Lyon, I hear.
translation.it: So che avete ballato con il giovane Lyon.

translation.en: May I ask, impertinently, I'm sure,
translation.it: Posso chiedervi, in modo senz'altro impertinente,

translation.en: did you want to kiss him,
or find out more about your case,
translation.it: o scoprire di più sul vostro caso,

translation.en: this Sarah Chapman?
Look, if you're trying to protect her,
translation.it: Ascoltate: se state cercando di proteggerla,

translation.en: know this.
I will protect her better.
There's someone wants to talk to her, and they're not as kind as me.
translation.it: Qualcun altro vuole parlarle con lei, e non è altrettanto gentile.

translation.en: "Someone"?
Who?
Why were you following me that night?
You were following Mae too, weren't you? That's why you found the flat.
translation.it: Anche voi seguivate Mae, non è vero? Ecco come avete trovato l'appartamento.

translation.en: Nice shirt.
Silk? On a policeman's salary?
translation.it: È di seta? Con lo stipendio di un poliziotto?

translation.en: Who's paying you, Superintendent Grail? Who's paying you to kill match girls?
translation.it: Chi vi paga, sovrintendente Grail? Chi vi paga per uccidere le fiammiferaie?

translation.en: Where's Sarah Chapman?
-I don't know. -She's a thief and a troublemaker.
translation.it: - Non lo so! - È una ladra piantagrane.

translation.en: You don't want to risk your skin for her.
translation.it: Non ti conviene rischiare la pelle per lei.

translation.en: Well, if I can't find it out from you, I'll find it out from someone else,
translation.it: Se non vuoi dirmelo lo scoprirò da qualcun altro,

translation.en: like her sister, little Bessie.
translation.it: magari da sua sorella, la piccola Bessie.

translation.en: She's just a little girl.
Oh, but that's how it starts, Enola Holmes!
translation.it: Oh, ma è così che si comincia, Enola Holmes.

translation.en: With little girls like her, and you, and Sarah Chapman,
translation.it: Con le ragazzine come lei, te e Sarah Chapman.

translation.en: asking questions, doubting those in charge,
not seeing their protection for what it is, trying to tear it down.
translation.it: non apprezzano la loro protezione, cercano di farli colare a picco.

translation.en: Well, it only takes one little flame to start a fire,
translation.it: Ebbene, per accendere un fuoco basta una fiammella

translation.en: and my job is to keep crushing those bloody flames out.
translation.it: e il mio lavoro è estinguere quelle dannate fiamme.

translation.en: Now, I'll be kind and give you one last chance.
translation.it: Ascolta, sarò buono e ti darò un'ultima possibilità.

translation.en: Where is she?
I don't know.
Then you're for the noose. Some detective you were.
translation.it: Allora finirai col cappio al collo. Alla faccia dell'investigatrice.

translation.en: Should have stuck to needlework.
[policeman] Sir?
-Sir. -[Sherlock] Don't be ridi--
Superintendent Grail.
Mr. Holmes.
[Sherlock] I'm here for my sister.
If you can arrange her release,
translation.it: Se voleste organizzare il suo rilascio,

translation.en: I'd much appreciate it.
She is my ward and a minor. And a murderer.
translation.it: - È minorenne e sotto la mia custodia. - E un'assassina.

translation.en: Any evidence you think you have against her--
I have plenty.
She was seen arguing with the victim, following the victim,
translation.it: È stata vista discutere con la vittima, seguire la vittima,

translation.en: fighting with the victim, and lastly, standing over the victim's dead body.
translation.it: litigare con la vittima e, infine, è stata trovata col cadavere.

translation.en: And when we find her there, with blood on her hands, she bloody runs.
translation.it: E quando l'abbiamo trovata con le mani insanguinate, è fuggita.

translation.en: I saw your murder site.
translation.it: Ho visto la scena del crimine.

translation.en: Marks on and around the door show that it was forced open,
translation.it: I segni sulla porta dimostrano che è stata forzata,

translation.en: and recently.
There were signs of a scuffle and boot marks from three separate intruders.
translation.it: C'è stata una colluttazione e c'erano impronte di tre intrusi diversi.

translation.en: One of them heavyset,
judging by the height and extent of the subsequent damage.
translation.it: a giudicare dall'altezza e dall'entità del danno.

translation.en: Traces of fabric and spots of blood
translation.it: Le tracce di stoffa e le macchie di sangue suggeriscono la presenza di qualcun altro,

translation.en: suggests that there was another occupant, likely female,
translation.it: Le tracce di stoffa e le macchie di sangue suggeriscono la presenza di qualcun altro, probabilmente una donna, che sembra aver reagito

translation.en: who seems to have fought back,
translation.it: probabilmente una donna, che sembra aver reagito

translation.en: using a sharp and improvised weapon…
before escaping through the window.
This was a targeted search and interrogation in which two women were discovered,
translation.it: È stata una perquisizione in cui sono state trovate due donne,

translation.en: and then my sister arrived,
translation.it: e poi è arrivata mia sorella.

translation.en: and you were curiously fast to arrive after her.
translation.it: E voi siete curiosamente arrivato poco dopo.

translation.en: Now, are you going to release her, or shall I?
translation.it: Ora, la rilascerete voi o devo farlo io?

translation.en: -Sergeant Beeston, if you please. -[Beeston] Sir.
translation.it: - Sergente Beeston, se non vi dispiace. - Signore.

translation.en: Fingerprint matching. New invention, Swiss.
translation.it: Le impronte digitali corrispondono. Un'invenzione svizzera.

translation.en: -You have heard of it? -I have.
[Grail] Would you care to look?
Makes our work so much more efficient,
translation.it: Rende il nostro lavoro molto più efficiente,

translation.en: especially in a murder case.
My sister never touched that weapon.
translation.it: Enola non ha mai toccato l'arma.

translation.en: Then why are her prints on it?
translation.it: Allora perché ci sono le sue impronte?

translation.en: It's a great age we live in, isn't it, Mr. Holmes?
translation.it: Bei tempi quelli in cui viviamo, vero, sig. Holmes?

translation.en: [woman] Have you any sense what time it is?
translation.it: Hai idea di che ora sia?

translation.en: -Hello, Edith. -You're lucky, I almost broke your legs.
translation.it: - Ciao, Edith. - Per poco non ti rompevo le gambe.

translation.en: Then I recognized the shoulders.
-You have very recognizable shoulders. -Enola's been arrested.
translation.it: - Hai spalle molto riconoscibili. - Enola è stata arrestata.

translation.en: For why?
Murder.
[Sherlock] What she's got tangled with,
translation.it: Ciò in cui si è cacciata

translation.en: it may go wider than I thought.
translation.it: potrebbe essere più grande del previsto.

translation.en: And there's something about this case that…
translation.it: E c'è qualcosa in questo caso che…

translation.en: Deduction alone will not solve?
translation.it: La sola deduzione non può risolvere?

translation.en: I may need your…
I need your help.
We need your help.
[guard] Exercise for 15 minutes.
[Edith] Well, like my mother always said,
translation.it: Beh, come diceva sempre mia madre:

translation.en: "Those who can turn to others when they're in need are the truly brave amongst us."
translation.it: "Coloro che aiutano chi ha bisogno sono i veri coraggiosi".

translation.en: Your mother sounds very different to mine.
translation.it: Tua madre sembra molto diversa dalla mia.

translation.en: I did try to stop her, but she's full of this fight.
translation.it: Ho provato a fermarla, ma è presa da questa lotta.

translation.en: [guard] There we go. Finally.
[Edith] You can't control Enola Holmes.
She's a force of nature, a law unto herself.
translation.it: È una forza della natura, segue delle regole proprie.

translation.en: [guard] Go easy on her, girls.
Yes, she is.
And I fear she will hang.
[woman] Come on, girls!
In there.
'Tis I.
Oh, it is good to see you.
Hang on!
They're onto us!
-Yah! -Be ready in there!
So this case of yours, how's it going?
translation.it: Allora, come va questo tuo caso?

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.it: Non lo so. Volevo aiutare una ragazza a trovare la sorella.

translation.en: I was trying to help a girl find her sister, and I've made things worse.
translation.it: Non lo so. Volevo aiutare una ragazza a trovare la sorella. - Ma ho peggiorato le cose. - Sciocchezze.

translation.en: Nonsense.
translation.it: - Ma ho peggiorato le cose. - Sciocchezze.

translation.en: You stirred up a hornet's nest. You are onto something.
translation.it: Hai sollevato un vespaio. C'è qualcosa sotto.

translation.en: -Standby! -Why else would they try and silence you?
Don't worry, it's completely harmless.
-[Edith] On your left! -My left or yours?
translation.it: - A sinistra! - La mia o la tua?

translation.en: [Edith] Yours!
This match factory, what do you know about it?
translation.it: Cosa sai della fabbrica di fiammiferi?

translation.en: It's a roaring success. In two years, it's doubled its profits.
translation.it: È un gran successo. In due anni hanno raddoppiato i profitti.

translation.en: -And now there's typhus. -Typhus?
translation.it: - E ora c'è il tifo. - Il tifo?

translation.en: Yes, the girls are going down with it. They're dying.
translation.it: Sì, le ragazze si stanno ammalando. Stanno morendo.

translation.en: That's a loose thread.
translation.it: - È un nodo da sciogliere. - Cosa?

translation.en: -What? -[Edith] They're back!
translation.it: - È un nodo da sciogliere. - Cosa? Ci raggiungono!

translation.en: Here they come! Brace yourselves!
We know about these factories.
Come on, come on!
Girls like Sarah Chapman, they're expendable.
translation.it: Le ragazze come Sarah sono sacrificabili.

translation.en: They go missing, too often they die, no one cares.
translation.it: Spariscono o muoiono e non importa a nessuno.

translation.en: But this girl, they care about. And greatly.
translation.it: Ma di questa ragazza gli importa molto.

translation.en: So, what does she know?
-[Edith laughs] -[policeman] Get up here now!
She stole something. Some papers.
Aha! So what's she gonna do with them? What's her plan? She's not a thief.
translation.it: E cosa intende farne? Qual è il suo piano? Non è una ladra.

translation.en: She's not a blackmailer. She is a troublemaker.
translation.it: Non è una ricattatrice. È una piantagrane.

translation.en: She knows something, and that is infinitely more dangerous.
translation.it: Lei sa qualcosa, il che è molto più pericoloso.

translation.en: [Edith] Come on, lads!
-Stand by to the right! -Would you mind?
-[Edith] Wait for it. -W-W-Where?
-Wait for it! -Straight.
Now!
[policeman] Get it out! Get it out of here!
Now, whatever Sarah's hiding, Enola, it's a secret.
translation.it: Qualsiasi cosa nasconda Sarah, Enola, è un segreto.

translation.en: You need to look for what she knows, Enola.
translation.it: Devi scoprire quello che sa, Enola.

translation.en: Find that out, and everything else will follow.
translation.it: Scoprilo, e poi verrà il resto.

translation.en: She's probably under your nose.
-Huh? -Get down!
That's just rude.
-Grail. -[gunshot]
[Eudoria] You all right, Edith? [Edith] Just about! Yah!
translation.it: - Stai bene, Edith? - Più o meno!

translation.en: Oh, for goodness sake!
That's not good.
[policeman] Get 'em to the bank!
You all right? You all right?
-All right? -I'm all right, yeah.
Oh no.
[policeman] Sir.
Glory be.
It's the Holy Trinity.
I'll make commissioner for this.
Take 'em.
Must we?
I fear so.
♪ And Lord of Lords ♪
Enola… this is not harmless.
Run!
[Eudoria groans] Good thing I never valued my pelvis.
translation.it: Per fortuna il bacino non mi serve.

translation.en: How about you, Edith?
-How are the kidneys? -[Edith] Fine.
I quite enjoyed it.
Hm. You enjoy everything. It's most irritating.
translation.it: A te piace tutto. È alquanto irritante.

translation.en: [Edith] Come on, this way. Better get a move on.
[Eudoria] All right.
So, um, how's that useless boy of yours?
translation.it: Come sta quel tuo ragazzo inutile?

translation.en: I hear he's doing good work.
translation.it: Pare stia facendo un buon lavoro.

translation.en: -He is. -Uh-huh.
Well then, perhaps not so useless after all.
translation.it: Beh, allora forse non è così inutile, dopotutto.

translation.en: I wouldn't say he's "my boy."
You know, I sometimes think I brought you up to be too independent.
translation.it: Sai, a volte penso di averti resa troppo indipendente.

translation.en: -Mother! -[Eudoria] I did it with all of you.
Your purpose must be to find who you are.
translation.it: Il tuo scopo dev'essere scoprire chi sei.

translation.en: You, Sherlock, Mycroft.
Strong, formidable, individual children,
but, well, perhaps a little lonely.
You will do very well on your own, Enola.
translation.it: Da sola te la caverai benissimo, Enola.

translation.en: But with others, you could be magnificent.
translation.it: Ma con qualcun altro potresti essere magnifica.

translation.en: Who do you think organized all of this after all? Hm?
translation.it: Chi pensi abbia organizzato tutto questo?

translation.en: Me?
No, you find your allies.
Work with them, and you will become more of who you are.
translation.it: Lavora insieme a loro e diventerai qualcosa di più grande.

translation.en: You speak with one voice,
and you will make more noise than you could ever have imagined.
translation.it: e farete più rumore di quanto avresti mai immaginato.

translation.en: Come on. She should go. We'll put them off her scent.
translation.it: Forza, è ora che vada. Noi li depisteremo.

translation.en: So, you dust yourself down…
…keep facing forward.
And if you ever get condemned for murder again, you give me a shout.
translation.it: E fammi un fischio, se ti accusassero di nuovo di omicidio.

translation.en: I will.
Thank you, Edith.
Be careful.
[Eudoria] And get a haircut.
It's a mess.
I think my hair is fine.
Come on.
[Enola] I need you to pack your things.
I need you to be in a safer place.
translation.it: Devi andare in un posto più sicuro.

translation.en: Is… Is my sister gone?
-Like Mae? -No.
-[Bessie] Is she-- -No.
I'm sure she's all right. I'm closer to finding her.
translation.it: Sono sicura che stia bene. La troverò presto.

translation.en: Doris,
she'll take me in.
She's got a spare bed now.
translation.it: Ora ha un letto in più.

translation.en: Her sister?
[Bessie] Dead.
Typhus.
[Enola] Dead.
There's traces of something in this soil.
translation.it: In questo terriccio ci sono delle tracce.

translation.en: One has red, and one has white in it.
The matches you make, when did they change from red to white?
translation.it: I vostri fiammiferi, quando sono passati dal rosso al bianco?

translation.en: I dunno. Around two years ago.
translation.it: Non saprei. Circa due anni fa.

translation.en: In two years, he's turned red into black. Or should I say red into white?
translation.it: In due anni, ha trasformato il rosso in nero. O dovrei dire il rosso in bianco?

translation.en: [Mr. Lyon] Typhus. The plague of our times. Two years it's been killing these girls.
translation.it: Tifo. Il flagello dei giorni nostri. Uccide queste ragazze da due anni.

translation.en: Out.
What are you looking at?
I need your help.
Don't make me repeat it! May I come in?
Firstly, I would like to apologize for so much.
translation.it: Prima di tutto, vorrei scusarmi per tante cose.

translation.en: I have failed to see allies in plain sight.
translation.it: Non ho capito chi fossero i miei alleati.

translation.en: -And I have-- -Enola.
There's something I wish to say too.
-[Enola] All right. -If you'd just--
All day, every day, all I do is compromise.
translation.it: Tutto il giorno, ogni giorno, non faccio che scendere a compromessi.

translation.en: If I vote for this lord's bill that will allow him to pump bilge water into a lake,
translation.it: Se voto per questa legge per fargli pompare acqua sporca nel lago,

translation.en: then he will vote for my forestry reform.
translation.it: lui voterà per la mia riforma forestale.

translation.en: I want to stand up and say, "This isn't right," but I have no allies.
translation.it: Vorrei alzarmi e dire che non è giusto, ma non ho alleati.

translation.en: So to do so would be to risk all that is good,
translation.it: Significherebbe rischiare ciò che c'è di buono,

translation.en: so I lie awake trying to work out which path to follow, alone.
translation.it: quindi non chiudo occhio per capire che strada seguire, da solo.

translation.en: There is no search for a wife,
because politics consumes me constantly.
translation.it: perché la politica mi consuma completamente.

translation.en: That is the speech I stored up for you.
translation.it: Ecco il discorso che avevo preparato.

translation.en: You're a good man.
I'm a man now?
On occasion.
But I understand your struggle, because I struggle too.
