translation.it: Ma ti capisco, anch'io sono tormentata.

translation.en: I am sorry we cannot talk more, because I have--
translation.it: Mi spiace non poter parlare di più, ma ho…

translation.en: A case to solve?
The girl I'm looking for, Sarah Chapman,
translation.it: La ragazza che cerco, Sarah Chapman,

translation.en: she has proof that girls are dying from the phosphorus they work with every day.
translation.it: ha la prova che molte ragazze muoiono per via del fosforo con cui lavorano.

translation.en: And the factory are trying to cover it up as typhus.
translation.it: E la fabbrica finge che sia per il tifo.

translation.en: She knows it,
and someone is going to kill her for it.
translation.it: e qualcuno la ucciderà per questo.

translation.en: Then what can we do?
We?
-Don't open it. it could be the police. -You're still wanted by the police?
translation.it: Non aprire. Forse è la polizia. - Sei ancora ricercata? - Certo. Sono evasa.

translation.en: -Of course. I escaped jail. -You escaped?
translation.it: - Sei ancora ricercata? - Certo. Sono evasa. - Sei evasa? - Non dovevo dirtelo.

translation.en: Forget I told you that.
The lights are on. If I don't answer, they'll suspect more. Hide.
translation.it: Se non rispondo sospetteranno di più. Nasconditi.

translation.en: -[knocking continues] -[Tewkesbury] Coming.
-Miss Cicely. -[Cicely] I'm sorry it's so late.
No, no, not at all. I-I told you to come. I-I want to help.
translation.it: No, figuratevi. Vi ho invitata io. Voglio aiutarvi.

translation.en: -[Cicely] Is anyone else here? -[Tewkesbury] No.
Better we are alone, for it is imperative that I speak with you.
translation.it: Bene. Meglio essere soli, perché devo assolutamente parlarvi.

translation.en: Sir, I feel that you're a man of great character
translation.it: Signore, voi siete un uomo di grande carattere

translation.en: and that I can trust you.
Which is why I fear I may have to unburden myself, and it may prove shocking.
translation.it: Dovrò farvi una confessione potenzialmente scioccante.

translation.en: [Tewkesbury] Miss Cicely--
It's just, I've been wanting to speak with you about… a relationship.
Oh, that. Yes. Uh, perhaps we can discuss this another time?
translation.it: Oh, quello. Sì. Potremmo parlarne un'altra volta?

translation.en: [Cicely] Please, sir.
I'm terribly sorry. Let me assure you, I do share your interest.
translation.it: - Vi prego. - Mi dispiace. Vi assicuro che condivido il vostro interesse,

translation.en: -We will talk again. -[Cicely] Thank you.
She's gone. She was flustered.
Do not think of doubting me. Cicely was here for my help.
translation.it: Non dubitare di me. Cicely vuole il mio aiuto.

translation.en: She told me at the ball that she's working on a bill to change factory law.
translation.it: Al ballo mi ha detto che vuole cambiare la legge sulle fabbriche.

translation.en: She's unearthed something, some corruption or other.
translation.it: Ha scoperto qualcosa, problemi di corruzione.

translation.en: She's doing what?
Enola, if you have any concerns, I tell you categorically, I…
translation.it: Enola, se hai dei dubbi, ti assicuro categoricamente

translation.en: I have no eyes for anyone, but…
translation.it: che non ho occhi per nessuno a parte…

translation.en: Well, no, this is not quite how I wanted to say that.
translation.it: Beh, non è così che volevo dirtelo.

translation.en: But to say, in terms of romantic interests, yes, my interest is…
translation.it: Ma in termini di interessi romantici, sì, il mio interesse è…

translation.en: The reason I don't have to search, I'm busy with politics, like I said…
translation.it: Ciò che mi trattiene è la politica, come ho…

translation.en: [Cicely] You admire Lord Tewkesbury?
I hear he is a good man and a great reformer.
translation.it: So che è un brav'uomo e un gran riformatore.

translation.en: The woman I would be most interested in--
I mustn't lose my chance.
You're not listening.
Good evening, Lord Tewkesbury.
She didn't have a chaperone.
You got five seconds to tell me why you're here.
translation.it: Dimmi subito cosa ci fai qui.

translation.en: [Enola] I have been blind!
The phosphorus in the match-making has mixed with oxygen.
translation.it: Il fosforo si è mescolato all'ossigeno.

translation.en: I have missed everything. She's probably under your nose.
translation.it: - Non ci sono arrivata. - Probabilmente già lo sai.

translation.en: Cicely. [chuckles]
Sarah is Cicely. [inhales sharply]
Cicely is Sarah!
-[Enola chuckles] -Enola!
Enola, what on Earth…
Enola, did you understand what I said?
Or rather what I didn't say? Did you understand… what I didn't say?
translation.it: O meglio, cosa non ho detto? Hai capito cosa non ho detto?

translation.en: Yes. You were saying that you…
[Tewkesbury] You'll learn.
That message you sent me with the fan at the ball, what did it mean?
translation.it: Il messaggio che mi hai mandato col ventaglio, al ballo, cosa significava?

translation.en: It means I love you.
[McIntyre] Ladies and gentlemen, to the future.
Of course.
They were working together, in love.
They had a plan.
To expose the corruption in that factory and stop what his father was doing.
translation.it: per denunciare la corruzione e fermare suo padre.

translation.en: They wanted your help. William Lyon invited you to that ball.
translation.it: Volevano il tuo aiuto. Ti ha invitato William Lyon.

translation.en: He's a radical just like you.
They needed my help. You're right.
translation.it: Avevano bisogno del mio aiuto, sì.

translation.en: But, Enola, we must return inside.
The police are pursuing you, and we have much to talk of.
translation.it: La polizia ti cerca e dobbiamo parlare.

translation.en: No! I know we have much to talk of, my dear, dear lord.
translation.it: No. So che dobbiamo parlare, mio caro Lord.

translation.en: You love me.
And as it turns out, I love you too.
translation.it: E a quanto pare ti amo anch'io.

translation.en: You love me too?
You really are a nincompoop.
Now hail a cab.
-[Enola] Shh. You're walking loudly. -[Tewkesbury] But it's gravel.
translation.it: - Fai un sacco di rumore. - Beh, è ghiaia!

translation.en: -[Enola] You've got large feet. -[Tewkesbury] I know.
translation.it: - Hai i piedi grandi. - Lo so!

translation.en: [grunts] Wait here. Keep guard. If anyone comes, just tell them you're a lord.
translation.it: Fai la guardia. Se arriva qualcuno, digli che sei un Lord.

translation.en: I am a lord.
Then they'll likely believe you.
All right.
[Sherlock and Enola] You.
-How ridiculous you are. -[Sherlock] I'm ridiculous?
I told you to stay safe and stay away.
translation.it: Ti avevo detto di rimanere al sicuro.

translation.en: Now you're breaking out of prison and have the police after you.
translation.it: Invece sei evasa di prigione e la polizia ti cerca.

translation.en: Oh. Are you hurt? I am sorry.
translation.it: Ti ho fatto male? Mi dispiace.

translation.en: Are you not hurt?
translation.it: Io non ti ho fatto male?

translation.en: It seems not.
I wonder who taught you to fight like that.
translation.it: Chissà chi ti ha insegnato a combattere.

translation.en: Another thing our mother has to answer for. She should have fed me as well as you is what I think.
translation.it: - Nostra madre ha molto di cui rispondere. - Avrebbe dovuto nutrirmi tanto quanto te.

translation.en: Hang on. Why are you here? Is it my case, or your own?
translation.it: Aspetta, perché sei qui? Per il mio caso o il tuo?

translation.en: Both. I know how Grail got your fingerprints.
translation.it: Entrambi. So come Grail ha ottenuto le tue impronte.

translation.en: Oxidized phosphorus dust lifted from the table and applied to the knife.
translation.it: Polvere di fosforo ossidato presa dal tavolo e applicata al coltello.

translation.en: You're innocent.
You doubted it?
Nothing's certain till it's proved.
And your case?
[Sherlock] My adversary, his trail, it leads here.
translation.it: Il mio avversario. Le sue tracce conducono qui.

translation.en: It seems our cases are connected.
translation.it: Sembra che i due casi siano collegati.

translation.en: Shall we?
Sarah's love.
And my thief in a taper crown hat.
translation.it: E il mio ladro col borsalino.

translation.en: Stay unemotional. There's nothing more we can do for him now.
translation.it: Resta distaccata. Non possiamo fare altro per lui.

translation.en: Need to keep our minds fresh and our eyes sharp.
translation.it: Dobbiamo tenere la mente e gli occhi aperti.

translation.en: [Enola] He was seized.
-[Sherlock] Yes, and searched. -[Enola] For the document he took?
translation.it: - E perquisito. - Cercavano il documento rubato.

translation.en: A knife? No, bigger.
translation.it: Un coltello? No, qualcosa di più grande.

translation.en: A cutlass.
Heavy boot scuffs,
and scratch marks from a cane that has a metal ferrule.
translation.it: e graffi di un bastone con una ghiera di metallo.

translation.en: But at whose behest?
There was another in this room.
This cigar had a holder.
And traces of wool.
[Sherlock] Astrakhan, the finest.
[Mr. Lyon] Well, Lord McIntyre, if I, um, might suggest a little lunch.
translation.it: Beh, Lord McIntyre, suggerirei di andare a pranzo.

translation.en: [William] Leave me be, please. They're watching.
translation.it: Lasciatemi in pace, vi prego. Ci osservano.

translation.en: Where did William steal from?
-The Treasury Office? -Yes.
The office of Lord McIntyre, Treasury Minister.
translation.it: L'ufficio di Lord McIntyre, ministro del Tesoro.

translation.en: How did you come to that?
I think what William stole was proof that Lyon and McIntyre were conspiring together.
translation.it: Credo che William abbia rubato la prova che Lyon e McIntyre sono in combutta.

translation.en: -Corruption. -[Enola] Yes.
Fueled by greed.
McIntyre has been secretly profiting from the factory.
translation.it: McIntyre ha tratto segretamente profitto dalla fabbrica.

translation.en: They changed the match formula to a cheaper phosphorus,
translation.it: Hanno cambiato la formula con un fosforo più economico,

translation.en: and it's deadly.
[Tewkesbury] Enola?
Enola, I was concerned for you.
You left me out there in the dark, and I nearly tore my…
translation.it: Mi hai lasciato lì al buio e mi sono quasi…

translation.en: -Sherlock Holmes? How do-- -Not the time.
Oh my…
-Is he-- -Stay unemotional.
-[Tewkesbury] Who did this? -Lord McIntyre.
translation.it: Chi è stato? - Lord McIntyre. - No.

translation.en: -No. -But it all fits.
translation.it: - Ma torna tutto. - Nessuno si è seduto qui.

translation.en: No one has sat in this chair. No marks on the carpet, no indentation.
translation.it: - Ma torna tutto. - Nessuno si è seduto qui. Tappeto immacolato, nessuna impronta. Il sigaro è stato fumato, ma è freddo.

translation.en: The cigar has been smoked, but cold.
translation.it: Tappeto immacolato, nessuna impronta. Il sigaro è stato fumato, ma è freddo.

translation.en: And look, no ash.
-No lips have touched that glass. -[Sherlock] Exactly.
translation.it: - Nessuno ha bevuto dal bicchiere. - Esatto.

translation.en: These clues have been planted for us to find, to mislead us from the true villain.
translation.it: Questi indizi sono stati messi apposta, per sviarci dal vero responsabile.

translation.en: This has all been staged.
By who?
Not McIntyre, but by someone who had a lot to lose without that document.
translation.it: Non McIntyre, ma qualcuno che teneva a quel documento.

translation.en: Someone who knew what they were up to and was blackmailing them.
translation.it: Che sapeva cosa stavano facendo e li ricattava.

translation.en: My opponent.
Someone who likes a game.
-Did they get what they wanted? -[Sherlock] No, I don't think so.
translation.it: - Ha ottenuto ciò che voleva? - Non credo.

translation.en: Poor William.
-[Enola] They did get something. -[Sherlock] Mae's terrible music.
translation.it: - Qualcosa l'ha ottenuto. - L'orribile musica di Mae.

translation.en: "The Truth of the Gods."
Could be biblical, mythical. Theatrical?
translation.it: - Che sia qualcosa di biblico o mitico? - O teatrale?

translation.en: The Gods is the top row of the theater.
translation.it: Gli dèi sono la fila superiore del teatro.

translation.en: The balcony.
Doesn't everyone know that?
This isn't music.
It's a map.
Just to be clear as to what we might be about to face…
translation.it: Giusto per essere chiari riguardo a cosa andiamo incontro…

translation.en: There may be some violence. You've faced it before.
translation.it: Potrebbe essere pericoloso. Hai già affrontato cose simili.

translation.en: Yes. I did have part of a suit of armor on.
But yes, fighting will be… [chuckles]
Yes.
-You've been in a fight before? -Yes, plenty of fights.
translation.it: - Non l'hai mai fatto? - Sì, molte volte.

translation.en: Fenced for my school.
Fine. Can you teach me to fight?
translation.it: E va bene, mi insegni a combattere?

translation.en: What, right now? In a carriage?
Did I not teach you to dance in five minutes in a bathroom?
translation.it: Non ti ho insegnato a ballare in cinque minuti in un bagno?

translation.en: All right. Fine.
There are two secrets to fighting. Avoid the punch, make the counterpunch.
translation.it: I segreti sono due. Evita il pugno e contrattacca.

translation.en: I don't see how two secrets-- Ow!
Your first lesson.
Your second. You didn't avoid the punch.
translation.it: E la seconda. Non hai evitato il pugno.

translation.en: -You can hardly expect me to hit a girl. -Oh dear.
translation.it: - Credi che picchierei una ragazza? - Oh, cielo.

translation.en: I'm not some-- Ow!
Ow! Will you stop that?
[laughing] I can't stop.
-[both laugh] -[Sherlock] We're approaching.
I may need more of those lessons.
[Enola] X marks the spot.
[Enola] Sarah.
It's all there.
All the proof we need.
[Enola] The contract between Lyon and McIntyre
translation.it: Il contratto tra Lyon e McIntyre

translation.en: to change the phosphorus.
What William stole for you.
And the pages from the factory register.
translation.it: E le pagine del registro della fabbrica.

translation.en: That's what you stole from the office.
These are the names of the girls they killed. [Sarah] I couldn't let 'em be forgotten.
translation.it: - I nomi delle ragazze che hanno ucciso. - Non devono essere dimenticate.

translation.en: And it's proof that match girls are dying from working in that factory,
translation.it: Ed è la prova che le fiammiferaie muoiono per aver lavorato lì,

translation.en: and they knew it all along.
You're a bloody good detective, Enola Holmes.
translation.it: Sei una brava investigatrice, Enola Holmes.

translation.en: You are too, Sarah Chapman.
I will share this with the world, I promise you.
translation.it: Lo sapranno tutti, te lo prometto.

translation.en: Thank you.
Now we must find William. He was supposed to meet me six hours ago.
translation.it: Devo trovare William. Avevamo appuntamento ore fa.

translation.en: I'm afraid William won't be coming.
What?
I'm sorry.
I'm so sorry.
I told him we had everything we needed.
translation.it: Gli ho detto che avevamo tutto il necessario,

translation.en: That we should just go public.
He said nobody would care unless we had someone in power who would listen.
translation.it: Ha detto che dovevamo trovare qualcuno al potere che ci ascoltasse.

translation.en: He was just trying to keep me safe.
And now I've lost him.
We must move quickly, or we'll lose you too.
translation.it: Dobbiamo sbrigarci, o perderemo anche te.

translation.en: [Grail] Losing this…
losing that.
-[Grail] Seems you've lost everything. -Bessie!
You've all been very careless.
I'll take those. Let go of her.
translation.it: - Quelli li prendo io. - Lasciatela andare.

translation.en: Give me the papers and I will.
translation.it: Dammi i documenti e lo farò.

translation.en: Run, Bessie!
-[Sherlock] Don't just stand there! -[tense music continues]
-[Grail] Get after them! -[dramatic music plays]
Avoid the punch, make the counterpunch.
[Enola] No!
[Sarah] Bessie!
[Enola] Run.
[Enola] I said run!
[Tewkesbury] Enola!
-[Enola gasps] -[Mae] You got more to you than I thought.
What places we find ourselves in.
translation.it: È assurdo in cosa ci ritroviamo, a volte.

translation.en: What places indeed.
I've always loved the theater.
Got it?
I used to dream I'd end up on the stage. [chuckles]
You're not rid of me yet,
Viscount Tewkesbury, Marquess of Basilwether.
-Hurrah! -[Enola grunts]
Are you all right?
You were made to fight.
Congratulations.
[Enola] Lord McIntyre. What are you doing here?
translation.it: Lord McIntyre. Cosa ci fate qui?

translation.en: [chuckles] I was summoned.
Your brother knew that I would want to see the right people shown justice.
translation.it: Vostro fratello sapeva che avrei fatto arrestare questa gente.

translation.en: And I don't know how to thank you for retrieving this government property
translation.it: Vi ringrazio molto per aver recuperato la proprietà del governo

translation.en: and, uh, bringing this killer to light.
A rot amongst our ranks.
translation.it: Una mela marcia tra i nostri ranghi.

translation.en: The world shall know the name Enola Holmes,
translation.it: Il mondo conoscerà il nome di Enola Holmes,

translation.en: I'll make sure of it.
Lestrade, arrest that girl.
-[tense music plays] -She's done nothing wrong. On what charge, sir?
translation.it: - Non ha fatto niente di male! - Per che cosa?

translation.en: -Theft. -All she stole from you was the truth.
translation.it: Furto. Vi ha solo rubato la verità.

translation.en: She took personal information,
which she used for extortion and blackmail.
translation.it: che ha poi usato a fini di estorsione e ricatto.

translation.en: Which is why she will serve her time.
translation.it: Ed è per questo che sconterà la sua pena.

translation.en: But you are mistaken.
She was not your blackmailer.
translation.it: Non era lei la vostra ricattatrice.

translation.en: I summoned you here to draw that very person out.
translation.it: Vi ho convocato proprio per attirare qui quella persona.

translation.en: The accounting was masterful.
A tangle of roots, but all pointed to one pocket.
translation.it: Era molto intricata, ma tutto puntava verso un'unica tasca.

translation.en: One person receiving the fruits of their schemes
translation.it: Una sola persona che raccoglie i frutti delle proprie macchinazioni

translation.en: with no one noticing.
Hearing everything, seeing everything.
Ignored for years.
[Sherlock] Playing them all.
It's all a game.
And it's fun, once you know the rules.
translation.it: Ed è divertente, se si conoscono le regole.

translation.en: Miss Mira Troy. [chuckles] Absurd.
Oh, I don't believe it.
[Miss Troy] It's remarkable what can be done
translation.it: È incredibile cosa si riesce a fare

translation.en: when people underestimate you.
[Enola] And then came the problem.
William stole the contract.
He threatened to cut off your money train. And you couldn't have that.
translation.it: - Il gioco sarebbe finito. - E non potevate permetterlo.

translation.en: You hired Grail to retrieve the document,
translation.it: Avete assunto Grail per recuperare il documento,

translation.en: but things got out of hand, so you tried to point us to Lord McIntyre.
translation.it: ma la situazione è precipitata e avete provato a incolpare Lord McIntyre.

translation.en: A rare misstep in your game…
translation.it: Un raro passo falso nel vostro piano…

translation.en: Such a shame our divertissement has to end, Mr. Holmes.
translation.it: È un peccato che il nostro divertimento debba finire, signor Holmes.

translation.en: I was so enjoying it.
And you, Enola. [chuckles]
Miss Troy, you have been behind this?
translation.it: Signorina Troy, ci siete voi dietro tutto questo?

translation.en: Of course, you never can find the proper staff.
translation.it: Certo, non si riesce mai a trovare il personale adatto.

translation.en: I only wanted the agreements back.
Though I couldn't be seen to question William myself,
translation.it: E non potevo interrogare William direttamente,

translation.en: you were so obliging.
translation.it: ma tu l'hai fatto al posto mio.

translation.en: If you wish to speak with William, you could always try with that.
translation.it: Se volete parlare con William, potete provare con quello.

translation.en: [Miss Troy] Just a pity he was smarter and braver in the end than I'd expected.
translation.it: Peccato che sia stato più intelligente e coraggioso del previsto.

translation.en: They both were. Their deaths were so unnecessary.
translation.it: Tutti e due. Le loro morti non erano necessarie.

translation.en: But Superintendent Grail was somewhat of a blunt instrument.
translation.it: Ma il sovrintendente Grail è stato alquanto… zelante.

translation.en: [McIntyre] You!
How dare you take advantage of your position!
translation.it: Come osate approfittare della vostra posizione?

translation.en: I take advantage?
What were my advantages?
Treated like a common servant when I have twice the mind of yours.
translation.it: Trattata come una comune serva quando sono molto più intelligente di voi.

translation.en: Any of yours.
Why shouldn't I have a share of your ill-begotten riches
translation.it: Perché non prendermi una parte delle vostre ricchezze illecite

translation.en: and punish you at the same time?
Why shouldn't I be rewarded for what I can do?
translation.it: Perché non dovrei essere ricompensata per le mie abilità?

translation.en: Where is my place in this… society?
translation.it: Qual è il mio posto in questa società?

translation.en: I am a woman.
I cannot join clubs,
I cannot own shares, I cannot advance myself as they can.
translation.it: non posso possedere azioni, non posso farmi strada come loro.

translation.en: So…
I found my own way.
translation.it: ho trovato la mia strada da sola,

translation.en: [inhales] And it was fun.
Lestrade,
take her away.
Yes, sir.
On what charge, sir?
-Extortion. -Uh, yes, yes.
Blackmail, murder.
Go.
Such a shame our little dance has to end.
translation.it: Peccato che il nostro ballo debba finire.

translation.en: For now at least.
Perhaps we shall take to the floor again.
translation.it: Forse un giorno torneremo in pista.

translation.en: [McIntyre] Well, there. That's that then.
I accidentally burnt my own property. What of it?
translation.it: Ho bruciato per sbaglio i miei documenti. E ora?

translation.en: You are corrupt, sir.
And complicit in the deaths of hundreds of match girls.
translation.it: E complice della morte di centinaia di ragazze.

translation.en: Where is your proof?
[McIntyre] Good.
So… back to business.
-Sir, you cannot-- -Tewkesbury.
Patience.
Glory be.
[Sarah] All those names, those lives,
I failed 'em, Enola.
Don't say that.
Mae gone…
William gone,
and they're gonna get away with it. You heard the man. "Where's your proof?"
translation.it: E la faranno franca. L'hai sentito. "Dove sono le prove?"

translation.en: What do we have now?
We have each other…
and we have the truth.
You're late, Bess Chapman. Docking you a penny.
translation.it: Sei in ritardo, Bess Chapman. Ti decurto un penny dalla paga.

translation.en: Oi.
You're not welcome here no more.
translation.it: Non sei più la benvenuta, qui.

translation.en: What are you doing? Oi!
Get down.
[yelling] Get down!
Let her speak!
[Sarah] A few weeks ago,
Mae Izley, William Lyon, and I set out to prove something.
translation.it: io, Mae Izley e William Lyon abbiamo deciso di dimostrare qualcosa.

translation.en: To prove that this factory was killing people,
translation.it: Dimostrare che questa fabbrica uccide, e loro lo sapevano.

translation.en: But they decided that profit mattered more than we did.
translation.it: Ma hanno deciso che il profitto contava più di noi.

translation.en: -You're coming with me. -[Enola] Shh!
It ain't typhus that's killing us. It's the phosphorus. What we work with every day.
translation.it: - Non è il tifo a ucciderci, è il fosforo. - Quello con cui lavoriamo ogni giorno.

translation.en: You lying little toerag.
That's a penny off your wages!
translation.it: Ti decurto un penny dalla paga!

translation.en: These were our friends…
our sisters…
and our children.
Well, it stops now.
It's time for us to use the only thing we have. Ourselves.
translation.it: È ora di usare l'unica arma che abbiamo, noi stesse.

translation.en: It's time for us to refuse to work.
translation.it: È ora che ci rifiutiamo di lavorare.

translation.en: It's time to tell 'em no.
translation.it: È ora di dire di no.

translation.en: -Right, get back to work. -[Enola] No!
You leave here, there is no coming back.
translation.it: Se ve ne andate, non potrete più tornare indietro.

translation.en: You will not get employed here again.
Well, will you join me?
[Crouch] Think of your families. Don't do it, girls.
translation.it: Pensate alle vostre famiglie. Non fatelo, ragazze.

translation.en: It is not worth the risk.
[Sarah] Well,
will ya?
[Crouch] This is how the world works.
translation.it: È così che va il mondo.

translation.en: Please, girls.
I know you're scared. I am too. But it's the only power we have!
translation.it: So che avete paura, ne ho anch'io, ma è l'unico potere che abbiamo!

translation.en: [Crouch] Right,
get that machine back on and get back to work.
translation.it: Rimettete tutto in funzione e tornate al lavoro.

translation.en: [Sarah] Right.
[Enola] No.
This can't be their future. I'm sorry, Enola.
translation.it: - Questo non può essere il loro futuro. - Mi dispiace, Enola.

translation.en: -[foot stomps] -[Crouch] Stop that.
-[foot stomps] -Stop that.
Be one voice.
-[feet stomp in unison] -That's enough!
Stop that!
Can't anyone control these bloody women?
Come on, girls.
-[man] Where are you going? -[Bessie] Westminster!
There they go. That's a whole lot of noise.
translation.it: - Eccole che se ne vanno. - Quanto rumore.

translation.en: She likes causing trouble, doesn't she?
It's as if she was molded that way.
translation.it: Quasi come se fosse stata cresciuta così.

translation.en: She still needs that haircut.
Seems your boy has learned how to fight.
translation.it: Il tuo ragazzo ha imparato a combattere.

translation.en: [Lestrade] Lord McIntyre.
Indeed.
He's not my boy.
translation.it: E non è il mio ragazzo.

translation.en: [Sherlock] "Pay what you can."
And what will people pay you in? Potatoes and gratitude?
translation.it: E con cosa ti pagheranno? Patate e gratitudine?

translation.en: If that's all they have.
You can deal with the hoits and toits. This is where I should be.
translation.it: Alle cose importanti puoi pensare tu. Io sto bene qui.

translation.en: Edith said she'll be kind with the rent.
translation.it: E poi, Edith sarà clemente con l'affitto.

translation.en: You know, you are aware, should you wish some finer surrounds, I could, uh…
translation.it: Sai, se mai dovessi desiderare un ambiente migliore, potrei…

translation.en: I was thinking…
Holmes and Holmes?
A partnership?
That is the kindest offer.
But if I did that, I would always be in your shadow.
translation.it: Ma se lo facessi resterei per sempre nella tua ombra.

translation.en: Hm. Yes.
Though I do like this new version of you. No one should be alone all the time.
translation.it: Però mi piace questa nuova versione di te. Non bisognerebbe stare sempre da soli.

translation.en: A friend would do you well.
Perhaps I should write that down.
I shall drop by to check on you. I would like that.
translation.it: - Passerò a vedere come te la cavi. - Mi piacerebbe.

translation.en: Perhaps you could come to Baker Street from time to time…
translation.it: Magari di tanto in tanto potresti venire a Baker Street…

translation.en: to check on me.
translation.it: a vedere come me la cavo.

translation.en: Perhaps we can fix on Thursday, 4 p.m.
Thursday at 4:00 it is.
It seems I shan't be the last to interrupt you today.
translation.it: Non sono l'ultimo a interromperti, oggi.

translation.en: And he has flowers.
-[Tewkesbury] Sherlock. -Tewkesbury.
-See you on Thursday. -[Tewkesbury] Bye, Sherlock.
-[Edith] Sherlock? -Yes.
Your paper.
Thank you.
And…
thank you… for everything.
[Enola] Tewkesbury, when did I give you the impression that I like flowers?
translation.it: Quando ti ho dato l'impressione che mi piacciano i fiori?

translation.en: They're called Spreading Bellflowers. Wild, of course.
Attracted to ancient woodland, wiry, deceptive,
translation.it: Sono attratte dai boschi secolari, ispide, ingannevoli,

translation.en: refuse to behave according to any rules,
translation.it: si rifiutano di seguire le regole,

translation.en: but their petals are so delicate, and their flowers--
translation.it: ma hanno petali incredibilmente delicati e i loro fiori…

translation.en: Two things.
Your metaphor is tortured, and I don't have delicate petals.
translation.it: La tua metafora è tirata e io non ho petali delicati.

translation.en: [Tewkesbury] Oh, and, and, and…
It is an invitation to a ball being given by--
translation.it: Ho un invito al ballo organizzato da Lady…

translation.en: Uh, I am not going to a ball with you. I got arrested at the last one.
translation.it: Non ci vengo a un ballo con te. L'ultima volta mi hanno arrestata.

translation.en: Well, all the more reason to dance again, wouldn't you say?
translation.it: Motivo in più per tornare a ballare, no?

translation.en: -[Enola] You're a nincompoop. -[Tewkesbury] And you are a coward.
translation.it: - Sei uno sciocco. - E tu una codarda.

translation.en: [Enola] How dare you speak to a lady like that? You are a disgrace, sir.
translation.it: Come osi parlare così a una donna? Una vera vergogna.

translation.en: [Tewkesbury] And yet you still hold my arm.
[Enola] And yet I still hold your arm.
-[uplifting music stops suddenly] -[film reel whirring]
[man] Sherlock Holmes? Yes.
I'm here for my appointment.
You're seeking a flatmate?
translation.it: - Non cercate un coinquilino? - Avete sbagliato indirizzo.

translation.en: -You must have the wrong address. -Really?
translation.it: - Non cercate un coinquilino? - Avete sbagliato indirizzo. Davvero?

translation.en: The young lady was very clear as to the place a-and the time.
translation.it: La signorina è stata chiara sul luogo e sull'ora.

translation.en: -"Thursday at 4:00," she said. -[sighs] -[man] You are Sherlock Holmes? -Hm.
translation.it: Ha detto giovedì alle 16:00. Siete Sherlock Holmes?

translation.en: Yes.
Please, do come in, Mr…?
Doctor. Watson.
